29b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan
29b7('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gas/ 
29b8('bum): ba rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i
30a1('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
30a2('bum): rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 
30a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par
30a4('bum): rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
30a5('bum): 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra ba com pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ thams cad na sa pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam
30a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyis kyang theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa mchis te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
30a7('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 
30a8('bum): lha'i bu dag de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// chos gang yang dmigs su med de/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ 
30b1('bum): mig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sla 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am// reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rna
30b2('bum): par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus
30b3('bum): te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te re/ ga pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ 
30b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'a dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
30b5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sa ma/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ na mkha'i
30b6('bum): khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am
30b7('bum): sred pa 'am/ len pa'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ 
30b8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ 
31a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'das byas stong pa nyid ngam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa'i ngam/ mtha'
31a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
31a3('bum): pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ 
31a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags
31a5('bum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa 'am/ bsam gtar rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
31a6('bum): ba rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
31a7('bum): med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ 
31a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig
31b1('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos
31b2('bum): gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa yang yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
31b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni de bzhin
31b4('bum): gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir na na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/ gsum ga
31b5('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgya sa kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las
31b6('bum): gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan
31b7('bum): du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan
31b8('bum): du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gsheg
32a1('bum): pa mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs
32a2('bum): so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid
32a3('bum): las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang
32a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'a ngas pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gsheg/ sa ba mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
32a5('bum): nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmig so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhi na gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
32a6('bum): las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du
32a7('bum): 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs
32a8('bum): pa mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs
32b1('bum): so// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams las gnan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
32b2('bum): pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// dbang po rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// stobs rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs
32b3('bum): pa mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
32b4('bum): mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gzha na du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// bas ma gtan rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
32b5('bum): mi dmigs so// tshad med pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// gzugs me dpa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sa sa gzhan du yang de bzhin
32b6('bum): gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du'ang
32b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// mang
32b8('bum): par shes pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// gzungs sgo rnams las
33a1('bum): gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// 
33a2('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// byams pa
33a3('bum): chen po las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// snying rje chen po las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la
33a4('bum): gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin ga shegs pa mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
33a5('bum): las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// / 
33a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// das po baphangs dad pa/ lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos 'di dag thams cad la
33a7('bum): slob ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slong ngo po// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
33a8('bum): bo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po// nang stong pa nyid la slob bo// phyi stong pa nyid la slob bo// phyi nang stong pa nyid la slong ngo // 
33b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo// don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob bo// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob bo// 
33b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob bo// chos thams
33b3('bum): cang stong pa nyid la slob bo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// 
33b4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob bo// yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob bo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
33b5('bum): slob bo// dbang po rnams la slob bo// stobs rnams la slob bo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo// 'phag
33b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la slob bo// bsam gtan rnams la slob bo// tshad med pa rnams la slob bo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo// rnam par thar pa rnams
33b7('bum): la slob bo// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slong po// mngon par shes
33b8('bum): pa rnams la slob bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob bo// mi 'jigs pa rnams la slob bo// so so
34a1('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob bo// byams pa chen po la slob bo// snying rje chen po la slob bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo// rgyun tu
34a2('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob bo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras sa la slob bo// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo// dgra bcom pa nyid la slob bo// rang byang chub la slob bo// lam gyi rnam
34a3('bum): pa shes pa nyid la slob bo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// lha'i bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi bral
34a4('bum): bar spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zham
34a5('bum): 'bring byed cing rgyal po'i khab pad mo yod pa'i nang gi tshong dus kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba dang bral bar ma gyur to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
34a6('bum): pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang dral bar ma gyur to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
34a7('bum): dar ma gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar
34a8('bum): ma gyur to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// chen po stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral
34b1('bum): bar ma gyur to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// 
34b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang bral ma gyur to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral
34b3('bum): ma gyur to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dngos po med pa'i
34b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dran pa nye ba ra gzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyi
34b5('bum): rkang pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// dbang po rnams da nga bral bar ma gyur to// stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang bral bar ma
34b6('bum): gyur to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// bsam gtan rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// tshang
34b7('bum): med pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rnam par thar pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// mthar gyis gnas
34b8('bum): nga'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rnam par thar pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// mngon par shes pa
35a1('bum): rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
35a2('bum): stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// mi 'jigs pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// byams pa chen po dang bral bar
35a3('bum): ma gyur to// snying rje chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// de ma rimigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan
35a4('bum): ngag dang yang bral bar ma gyur to// lha'i bu dag de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis nga la khye'u khyod
35a5('bum): ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa dag na bas la ba bzang po'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
35a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi
35a7('bum): ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
35a8('bum): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba
35b1('bum): mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor nga'i tshul dang / mig mi len mi
35b2('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid mi len mi 'dor
35b3('bum): nga'i tshul dang / gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sgra mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dri mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ro mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg mi len mi 'dor ba'i
35b4('bum): tshul dang / chos mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i
35b5('bum): rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam bar shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 
35b6('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi len 'i dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
35b7('bum): pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'odor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor
35b8('bum): ba'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'das te reg
36a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
36a2('bum): ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
36a3('bum): dang me'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / na mkha'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi len mi
36a4('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi
36a5('bum): len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi len mi 'a dor ba'i tshul dang / reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i chu la dang / tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sred pa
36a6('bum): mi len mi 'dor ba dang / len pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / srid pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rga shi mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 
36a7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 
36a8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
36b1('bum): dang / nang stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid sto pa nyid mi len mi
36b2('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus ma
36b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'angs pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dor ba
36b4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang bzhi na stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang gi
36b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
36b6('bum): nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong
36b7('bum): ba rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stobs rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
36b8('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi len ma 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi len mi 'dor
37a1('bum): nga'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshang med pa rnams mi ler mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
37a2('bum): 'jug pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 
37a3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam
37a4('bum): mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi le na mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs
37a5('bum): pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / snying
37a6('bum): rje chen po mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thams cad shes pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam
37a7('bum): pa shes pa nyid me len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams
37a8('bum): cang ma byed pa nyid 'thun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang / 'khor bzhi dang / 
37b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 
37b2('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs chen gyi lha'i
37b3('bum): bu dang / snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung snang gyi lha'i bu dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge pa'i lha'i bu dang / chung dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshad med
37b4('bum): dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge rgyus kyi lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshad med che ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang / mi che ba'i lnga'i bu dang
37b5('bum): mi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par mkhyen nas nga
37b6('bum): ngag thams cad dbang du btsugs te/ lha'i dbang po pa rgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge
37b7('bum): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi du mo'i lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 
37b8('bum): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bsgom pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang / mi 'dral
38a1('bum): bde dag ni bdud sdig to can dang / bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu
38a2('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur/ 'du shes stong pa nyid shin tu phyin
38a3('bum): gyis rlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
38a4('bum): ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mchi nam med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// 
38a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi sa/ mig stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
38a6('bum): 'gyur/ sna stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur/ lus stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 
38a7('bum): yid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma mang
38a8('bum): pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
38b1('bum): brlangs par 'gyur/ sgra stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dri stong pa nyid shin tu gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ro stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg
38b2('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid la glags mi
38b3('bum): rnyed mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed / smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig
38b4('bum): gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shi na tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i rnam par shes
38b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlab sa par 'gyur/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa 'di shin tu
38b6('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ 
38b7('bum): mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig gi 'dus
38b8('bum): te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
39a1('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
39a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rung / mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la
39a3('bum): glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu
39a4('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'a gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shi
39a5('bum): tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa'i
39a6('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la
39a7('bum): glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa das glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nga dag gis sa'i
39a8('bum): khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ma'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 
39b1('bum): rlung gi khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ na mkha'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
39b2('bum): brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med
39b3('bum): pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ma rig pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
39b4('bum): 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlab sa par 'gyur/ ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid shi
39b5('bum): tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sred pa stong pa nyid shin tu
39b6('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ len pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ srid pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
39b7('bum): par 'gyur/ rga shi stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma
39b8('bum): med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin
40a1('bum): gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlangs par 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shinatu
40a2('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
40a3('bum): par 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan
40a4('bum): ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'a de ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong
40a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
40a6('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong
40a7('bum): pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
40a8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dor ba med pa stong pa
40b1('bum): nying stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa
40b2('bum): 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po med pa stong pa
40b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin
40b4('bum): gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'de ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon
40b5('bum): pa med pas smon pa med pa la grags mi rnyed do// de ni 'a de ltar rig bu kyi dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
40b6('bum): par 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dbang po rnam
40b7('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
40b8('bum): par 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi
41a1('bum): rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang
41a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
41a3('bum): tshad med pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par
41a4('bum): thar pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 
41a5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa
41a6('bum): nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
41a7('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnying / mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la
41a8('bum): glags mi rnyeng // de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sto
41b1('bum): nga nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byams pa chen po stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
41b2('bum): 'gyur/ snying rje chen po stong zhid nyi tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
41b3('bum): ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs
41b4('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
41b5('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ste/ nga pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glag
41b6('bum): mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang
41b7('bum): gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid med do// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags lta
41b8('bum): zhing glags tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams
42a1('bum): cad la byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang btang snyoms shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi mo dag ni nyam nga ba mi spongs pas
42a2('bum): dus byed par yang mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gis sems can thams cad la yang dag
42a3('bum): par spong bas bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / 
42a4('bum): mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / 
42a5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chung ngu yang da ga ngar zhugs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang lha'i bu gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos pa dang / 
42a6('bum): ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang / kun chub par ma bya sa pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// 
42a7('bum): klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / 
42a8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
42b1('bum): dang yang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs pa 'am sdang bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i
42b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgom so// byi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu
42b3('bum): bsgoms so// phyi nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// chen po stong pa
42b4('bum): nying da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgom so// don dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shi na tu bsgoms so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
42b5('bum): nga'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// 'dus ma byas ste/ nga ba nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgra mas so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de mi dmi
42b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgom so// thog ma dang tha ma med stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms
42b7('bum): so/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// rang gi mtshan nyid
42b8('bum): stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de mi
43a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid snga
43a2('bum): pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lnga
43a3('bum): dang mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 
43a4('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi rje snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom lda na 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
43a5('bum): bdag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
43a6('bum): dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yid la bgyid pa dang mi 'bral ba de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang
43a7('bum): bar srung ba dang bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na sems can dmyal ba rnams
43a8('bum): kyang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas rnams kyang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur/ lha las phongs pa rnams
43b1('bum): kyang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur// mi las dbul ba rnams kyang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur/ nad dang gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad cing 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ 
43b2('bum): mu ge'i zhugs ngam thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam
43b3('bum): gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mngon par
43b4('bum): shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ spyi na pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar
43b5('bum): 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
43b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
43b7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig
43b8('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
44a1('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
44a2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
44a3('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur/ dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
44a4('bum): radran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung ba ra 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'byung bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du
44a5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'a gyur/ stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'angag
44a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mthar gyis gan
44a7('bum): nga'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi
44a8('bum): sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa ni 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa
44b1('bum): bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung
44b2('bum): bar 'gyur/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// 
44b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na rgyal rigs tsha zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba
44b4('bum): mchis par 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams mchis par 'gyur/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mchis
44b5('bum): par 'gyur/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'phrul da ga'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
44b6('bum): kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 
44b7('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung snang gi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ kun snang
44b8('bum): dang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung dge'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge rgyas kyi lha
45a1('bum): rnams mchis par 'gyur/ che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung che'i rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'bras bu
45a2('bum): che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ mi che ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gya nom snang ba'i
45a3('bum): lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'og min gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ rgyun tu
45a4('bum): zhugs pa mchis par 'gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba mchis bar 'gyur/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mchis par zhu
45a5('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa nyid mchis par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa mchis par 'gyur/ rang bya nga chub mchis par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas mchis par
45a6('bum): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mchis par 'gyur/ 'jig rten du de bzhin
45a7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mchis par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
45a8('bum): chos dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ bya
45b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang bskyang bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka'
45b2('bum): stsal to// ko'u shi ka de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas thams
45b3('bum): cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyuraro// lha las phongs pa rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// mi las dbul ba rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// nang dang gnod
45b4('bum): pa dang / 'gro ba'i nad thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / 'jig sa pa med par 'gyur ro// mu ge'i mya ngan thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
45b5('bum): dpa' chen po yod na dag pa bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'a jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan pa zhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi
45b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// sbyin pa'i
45b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
45b8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung
46a1('bum): bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nying 'jig rjen du 'byung bar 'gyur
46a2('bum): ro stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa
46a3('bum): nying 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med
46a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba med ba stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rang ba ni na stong pa nyid 'dzag rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos
46a5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
46a6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
46a7('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
46a8('bum): bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar
46b1('bum): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten
46b2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
46b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
46b4('bum): re/ mi 'jig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar
46b5('bum): 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten
46b6('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
46b7('bum): dpa' chen po yod na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro// 'khor
46b8('bum): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams yod par 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// mtshe ma'i lha rnams
47a1('bum): yod par 'gyur ro// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur
47a2('bum): ro// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod par
47a3('bum): 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// chung sdang gi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshad red snang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur
47a4('bum): ro dge ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnam sa yod par 'gyur ro// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod par
47a5('bum): 'gyur ro// che nga'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams
47a6('bum): yod par 'gyur ro// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyuraro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod
47a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa yod par
47a8('bum): 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro// 
47b1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa yod par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub yod par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
47b2('bum): chen po yod na sems can yongs su smin pa yod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
47b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
47b4('bum): dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bas na lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o// bku
47b5('bum): bstir bya'o// bu dung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rtag du rgyun mi 'chad par de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba da nga / bsgrub par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gang byang chub sems
47b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems dpa' de ni nga la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du
47b7('bum): bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems so// lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// 
47b8('bum): bu dud du ba'o// mchod par bya'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de la bsrung ba dang bskyang ba dang bskyab par bya'o// ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'di lta ste
48a1('bum): dper na 'das du'i tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ rtsi srung gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ ngal rtsi
48a2('bum): zhing bzhin du/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis gang bar gyur la de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis nam 'tsho ba'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / 
48a3('bum): bku stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas kyang gang la las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma dral
48a4('bum): bdag la rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka nyan thos dang rang
48a5('bum): sangs rgyas de dag yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
48a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig rten na yod
48a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de bas na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
48a8('bum): nga'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de la bsrung ba dang bskyang ba dang bskyang par bya'o// 
48b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu bdun no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
48b2('bum): pe rna bde nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
48b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di la
48b4('bum): thob pa'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyuraba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa
48b5('bum): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsnyen pa kur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas
48b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur bstir bgyi ba dang / pu dud du bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
48b7('bum): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
48b8('bum): par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du dran pa mi nyam pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa yongasu 'dzin pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / tshe phun sum chog
49a1('bum): pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'od phun sum chog
49a2('bum): pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mig phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 
49a3('bum): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sprul cing 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su mchi ba
49a4('bum): dang / gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams skye zhing 'byung bar gyur pa de dang de dag du mchis ni yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
49a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
49a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / phyi nang stong
49a7('bum): pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / 'dus byas
49a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / thog ma dang tha mamed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon
49b1('bum): tan rjod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
49b2('bum): kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / dngos po med
49b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon
49b4('bum): tan rjod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i yon tan rjod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
49b5('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / dbang po lnga'i yon tan rjod pa dang / stobs lnga'i yon tan rjod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan rjod pa dang / 'dag
49b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
49b7('bum): bar 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan rjod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan
49b8('bum): rjod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / mi 'jigs
50a1('bum): pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan rjod pa dang / byams pa chen po'i yon tan rjod pa dang / snying rje chen pa'i yon
50a2('bum): tan rjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yon tan rjod pa dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa
50a3('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa gsum la 'dul ba ni ngo mtshar che'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
50a4('bum): to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs
50a5('bum): su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs
50a6('bum): su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongasasu bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung bar 'gyur
50a7('bum): ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung
50a8('bum): bar 'gyur ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar
50b1('bum): 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongasasu bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung bar 'grur
50b2('bum): ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su
50b3('bum): bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su bzung bar
50b4('bum): 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
50b5('bum): pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / bsam gta na rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / tshad med
50b6('bum): ba rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba
50b7('bum): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su
50b8('bum): bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su bzung
51a1('bum): bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / so so
51a2('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
51a3('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba
51a4('bum): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung b.ra'agyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su bzung ba ra 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub yongs su bzung bar 'gyur
51a5('bum): ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba'ang ngo mtshar che'o// 'di skad ces
51a6('bum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung
51a7('bum): bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid
51a8('bum): yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar
51b1('bum): 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 
51b2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams
51b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa
51b4('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 
51b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'a gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su ba zung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su
51b6('bum): bzung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 
51b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 
51b8('bum): tshad med pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyuraro// 
52a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
52a2('bum): pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su bzung ba
52a3('bum): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jig pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bzung
52a4('bum): bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su bzung
52a5('bum): bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
52a6('bum): bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid y-i ngas su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rang byang chub yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su bzung bar
52a7('bum): 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / bcangs pad
52a8('bum): blags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis tshe 'di la yon tan gang dang gang yongs su zin par 'gyur ba de dag
52b1('bum): bstan kyis shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das la de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
52b2('bum): de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka mu stegs can gzhan dang / mu stegs spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'am/ gang zag nga rgyal
52b3('bum): can gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brgal bar 'dod pa dang / 'di dang dpral bar 'dod pa dang / 'di la brtsad par 'dod pa dang / dgal bar 'dod pa zhig byung na dag la
52b4('bum): bar 'dod pa dang / dpral bar bya bar 'dod pa dang / brtsad par 'dod pa dang / dgal bar 'dod pa de dag gi rgol ba dang / dpral bar bya ba dang / brtsad pa dang / dgal bar byed pa gang
52b5('bum): 'byung ba kun kyang myur du nub cing med par 'gyur te/ brgal bar dga' ba dang / dpral bar dga' ba dang / brtsad par dga' ba dang / dgal bar dga' ba de dag gi bas
52b6('bum): pa yang yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / 
52b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
52b8('bum): spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gang gi don tu sems can rnams yun ring por 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / shags su gyur pa'i phyi nang
53a1('bum): gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/ sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro// 
53a2('bum): gang gi don du sems can de dag yun ring por tshul khrims ngan par gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/ sems can de dag tshul
53a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro// gang gi don tu sems can de dag yun ring por khro ba dang gnod sems dang / 'tshe bar gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sem
53a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/ sems can de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dkod pa'i phyir ro// gang gi don tu sems can de dag yun ring
53a5('bum): por le lo byed par gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/ sems can de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
53a6('bum): pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro// gang gi don tu sems can de dag yun ring por sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i phyi nang gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs
53a7('bum): su btang ste/ sems can de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir ro// gang gi don tu sems can de dag yun ring por shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa'i phyi nang
53a8('bum): gi chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btang ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu bkod pa dang / yang dag par skal ba'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka
53b1('bum): gang gi don tu sems can de dag 'di lta ste/ bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang bas 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur pa'i bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba de dag byang chub sems dpa'
53b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos rnam par bcil te/ sems can de dag bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// tshad med pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba'i phyir ro// gzugs
53b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag
53b4('bum): par bskul ba'i phyir ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// rdzu 'phrul gi// nga ba bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// dbang
53b5('bum): po lnga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// stobs lnga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// 'phag
53b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par bskul ba'i
53b7('bum): phyir ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// ting nge 'dzin
53b8('bum): thams cad la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong yul yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// 
54a1('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// byams pa chen po la yang
54a2('bum): dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// snying rje chen po la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
54a3('bum): 'bras bu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// lan cig phyir 'ong 'bras bu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir
54a4('bum): mo dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// rang byang chub la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang
54a5('bum): dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sem sa dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di la yon tan 'di dag
54a6('bum): 'byung ste/ tshe rabs gzhan la yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can rnams
54a7('bum): smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du rab tu bkod nas/ phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das par gyur te/ ko'u shi ka de ni byang chub sems dpa'
54a8('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshe rabs gzhan la 'byung ba'i yon tan dang legs pa dag go// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang sa phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol
54b1('bum): tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa yod pa'i sa phyogs der bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'am mu steg
54b2('bum): can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'am/ gang zag nga rgyal can rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brgal ba 'am brtsad pa'am/ dgal ba 'am/ med par bya ba'i phyir 'ong
54b3('bum): bar mi nus te/ de'i gong du de dag la yon tan dang legs par 'gyur ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa dang gzung ba dang bsgom pas theg pa gsum gyis byung nas sdug bsngal
54b4('bum): mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa yod de der sbrul lam/ srog chags bkres pas mnar cing zas
54b5('bum): tshol ba zhig gis/ srog chags kyi rigs la la mthong bar 'gyur te/ des srog chags kyi rigs de bza' ba'i phyir de'i rjes su 'brang ste bsnyags par gyur na/ 
54b6('bum): de nas srog chags kyi rigs de 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag ste/ rtsi ma g+hi gang na yod pa der song na/ de nas sbrul de rtsi de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe
54b7('bum): na ko'u shi ka de ltar sbrul gyi gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa de ni rtsi ma g+hi'i yon tan te/ ko'u shi ka rtsi ma d+hi po de ni de lta bu'i mthu dang ldan no// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi ngu 'am rig
54b8('bum): kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la ni/ ko'u shi ka rgol ba dang rtsod pa dang / 
55a1('bum): 'gal bar byed pa yang dang gang byung ba de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzi byin dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthus de dag nye bar zhi ba dang
55a2('bum): med par 'gyur te/ gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid du med par gyur te/ rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka do ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sdig
55a3('bum): to mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa ste/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos gang thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed cing / rnam par 'phel bar byed pa
55a4('bum): ma yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mu ga nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// ma rig pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par
55a5('bum): 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// 'du byed nye bar zhi bar byed de// rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// rnam par she sa pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa
55a6('bum): ma yin no// ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// skye mched drug nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// reg pa nye
55a7('bum): bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// tshor ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sred pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel
55a8('bum): par byed pa ma yin no// len pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// srid pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// skye ba nye bar zhi bar
55b1('bum): byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// rga shi nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
55b2('bum): dang 'khrug pa nye bar zhi bar byed/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig gi bar du nye bar zhi bar byed de rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// bar du
55b3('bum): gcod pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sgrib pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// bag la nyal ba rnams
55b4('bum): bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// kun nas ldang ba rnams nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// bdag tu lta ba nye bar zhi
55b5('bum): bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sem sa can du lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// srog tu lta ba nye bar zhi
55b6('bum): bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// 'gro bar lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// gso bar lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel
55b7('bum): bar byed pa ma yin no// skyes dur lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// gang zag tu lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// 
55b8('bum): shed can du lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// sheng bdag tu lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// byed pa por lta ba
56a1('bum): nye ba zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// tshor ba por lta ba nye bar zhi bar byed de/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// shes pa
