81b2('bum): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang 'di las 'byung ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // drir mi 'ong ba rnams kyang 'di las byung
81b3('bum): dgra bcom pa rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa
81b4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams
81b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo // brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mig nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim gror mi bgyid/ 
81b6('bum): bkur stir mi bgyid/ pu dung du mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa de ltar mthu che bar ma 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
81b7('bum): pa/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang sangs rgyas la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang chos la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dge 'dun
81b8('bum): la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la nem nur med pa dang / gang chos la nem nur med pa dang / gang dge 'dun la nem nur med pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la shin tu rngon pa dang / 
82a1('bum): gang chos la shin tu rton pa dang / gang dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi
82a2('bum): mi gang sangs rgyas la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang chos la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dge 'dun la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la nem nur
82a3('bum): ma mchis pa dang / gang chos la nem nur ma mchis pa dang / gang dge 'dun la nem nur ma mchis pa dang / gang sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang / gang chos la shin tu rton pa dang / gang
82a4('bum): dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
82a5('bum): cu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod // 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod // 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las rnam
82a6('bum): par thar pa brgyad thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi
82a7('bum): las so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las
82a8('bum): kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrangs pa'i phyir lan cig
82b1('bum): phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam du'i gling gi mi las dam pa ma yin pa'i cha kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yong / 'dzam
82b2('bum): bu'i gling gi mi las bla ma'i cha kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu'i
82b3('bum): ji snyed cig yod / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ 'dzam du gling
82b4('bum): gi mi las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // de bas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang rnam
82b5('bum): par thar pa brgyang thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tha bde lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang so so yang dag par
82b6('bum): rig pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du
82b7('bum): rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni chos nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dod chags dang ni sdang dang gti mug rnams bsrabs pa'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas
82b8('bum): kyang dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla ma'i tshe'i kun tu sbyor nga lnga spangs pa'i slang du dgra bcom par
83a1('bum): gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu gling gi
83a2('bum): mi las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'dzam
83a3('bum): bu'i gling gi mi de dag las sangs rgyas la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / chos la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / dge 'dun la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas la nem nur
83a4('bum): med pa dang / chos la nem nur med pa dang / dge 'dun la nem nur med pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang sang sa rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang / chos la shin tu rton pa dang / 
83a5('bum): dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang rgyun tu zhugs par
83a6('bum): gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang dgra bcom par gyur
83a7('bum): ba de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de
83a8('bum): lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang byang chub tu spyod par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang / chos mthos
83b1('bum): pa dang / dge 'dun bsnyen ma bkur ba dang / sbyin pa ma byin pa dang / tshul khrims ma bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa mo bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus ma brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan rnams
83b2('bum): ma bsgoms pa dang / shes rab ma bsgoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
83b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
83b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / nang stong pa nyi da ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms
83b5('bum): pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / don da ma pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'dus byas
83b6('bum): stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
83b7('bum): pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgom
83b8('bum): ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgom pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / ngo bo nyid
84a1('bum): stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms
84a2('bum): pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dbang po rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / stobs rnams ma thos
84a3('bum): ma bsgoms pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i kham yan lag brgyad pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma thos ma
84a4('bum): bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan rnams ma thos ma bsgoms ba dang / tshad med pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma thos ma
84a5('bum): bsgoms pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad ma thos ma bsgom sa pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugapa dgu ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam par thar
84a6('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams ma thos ma bsgoms
84a7('bum): pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / so so yang dag
84a8('bum): par rig pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / byams pa chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / snying rje chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma thos ma
84b1('bum): bsgoms pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa'i phyir
84b2('bum): ro/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can las sangs rgyas la mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / chos la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang / dge 'dun la
84b3('bum): mos pa mi byed pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ de bas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang mthar
84b4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa ches tu ngo // de bas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob
84b5('bum): ba ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhu gas par gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dod chags dang
84b6('bum): zhe sdang ring gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa ches nyung ngo // 
84b7('bum): de bas kyang bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom par gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu gling gi maM las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo // 
84b8('bum): de bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bsam pa dag pa byang chub tu spyod pa ni ches nyung bar rig par bya'o// 
85a1('bum): ko'u shi ka mi rnams lta zhog gi de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu gling gi srog chags rnams las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam pa
85a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes
85a3('bum): pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod// 'dzam bu gling gi srog chags rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang
85a4('bum): gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang sa pa'i phyir/ phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i
85a5('bum): kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom par gyur pa nying dang / rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod// 'dzam bu gling gi srog chags rnam
85a6('bum): las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nem nur med pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la nem nur med pa ni ji snyed cig yod// 'dzam bu gling gi srog chags rnams las
85a7('bum): mar shes pa dang / phar shes pa dang / dge sbyong du shes pa dang / bram zer shes pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gror byed pa dang / sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / gso sbyong
85a8('bum): la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa la kha na ma tho bar 'du shes shing rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin du mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bdag med par 'du shes pa dang / mi gtsang bar 'du shes
85b1('bum): pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du mngon par dga' ba med par 'du shes pa ji snyed cig yod // 'dzam bu gling gi srog chags las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
85b2('bum): dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu gling gi srog chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par
85b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / 
85b4('bum): mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba ga/ sum spangs pa'i slad du/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs
85b5('bum): pa'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor
85b6('bum): ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / rang byang chub tu zhugs pa de lta bu ni shin tu nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu gling gi srog chags las bla na med pa yang
85b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta nga de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad
85b8('bum): smras pa de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi srogs chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par
86a1('bum): thar pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug
86a2('bum): thob pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa thob pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam
86a3('bum): pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / rang byang chub tu
86a4('bum): dag par zhugs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ de bas kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par
86a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa de lta bu ni ches
86a6('bum): nyung ngo // ko'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad med grangs med
86a7('bum): pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog
86a8('bum): ba'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag
86b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhan pa mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ko'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs
86b2('bum): rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
86b3('bum): tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las ngal cher nyan thos dang / 
86b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus med pa bsam
86b5('bum): bzhan pa mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal ba can rnams kyis bsgrubs par dka'o// ko'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sa ngas rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig
86b6('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas
86b7('bum): pa dang mi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo
86b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhan pa mos pa dma' ba shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par
87a1('bum): pa'o// ko'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs
87a2('bum): med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas
87a3('bum): par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ 
87a4('bum): brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhan pa mos pa dma' ba shes ra ba 'chal ba can rnams kyis bsgrubs par dka'o// ko'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgrib pa med pas/ 
87a5('bum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyis khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod
87a6('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs
87a7('bum): rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhan pa mos pa dpa' ba shes
87a8('bum): rab 'chal ba can rnams kyis bsgrubs par dka'o// ko'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
87b1('bum): bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas de las gcig gam
87b2('bum): gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa
87b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhen pa mos pa dma' ba shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrubs par dka'o// ko'u shi ka ngas 'di nas
87b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ lho nub kyi phye gas mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na
87b5('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de bas gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i
87b6('bum): sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
87b7('bum): byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhan pa mos pa dpa' ba shes rab 'chal ba can rnams kyis bsgrubs par dka'o// ko'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa
87b8('bum): med pas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod
88a1('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las
88a2('bum): phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus med
88a3('bum): pa bsam pa zhan pa mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal ba can rnams kyis bsgrubs par dka'o// ko'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig
88a4('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs
88a5('bum): mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shi ga phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par
88a6('bum): 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhan pa mos pa dma' ba shes rab 'chal ba can
88a7('bum): rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ko'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa med pas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad
88a8('bum): med grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog gi
88b1('bum): sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
88b2('bum): ni le lo can brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhan pa mos pa dma' ba shes rab 'chal ba can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med
88b3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag myur zhing bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na yang dang
88b4('bum): yang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mnyam par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya 'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// de
88b5('bum): ngag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhing bca nga ba dang / klog cing kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya zhing bris te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng
88b6('bum): ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// 
88b7('bum): dge ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus te/ de dag kyang gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya/ tshul
88b8('bum): bzhin du yid la bya ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
89a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
89a2('bum): pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma pas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med
89a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / 
89a4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'drul
89a5('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / 
89a6('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
89a7('bum): par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
89a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi mchos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gang ji snyed shes
89b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de dag kyang gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de
89b2('bum): ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltar shes par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
89b3('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
89b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 
89b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / do ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang chos
89b6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
89b7('bum): pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phag
89b8('bum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par
90a1('bum): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin
90a2('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
90a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dang gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dag la bslab par mdzad kyis/ bdag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// 'di
90a4('bum): lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi sto na pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan tshad med pa'i bar du yang bdag cag gi ston pa ste/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom
90a5('bum): ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa'o// rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis bstan pa yang 'di
90a6('bum): yin te/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
90a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slong slob pa
90a8('bum): dang / nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la
90b1('bum): slob slob pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slong
90b2('bum): slob pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
90b3('bum): la slob slob pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
90b4('bum): nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid slob slob pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob
90b5('bum): slob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / dbang po rnams la slob slob pa dang / stobs rnam sa la slob slob pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
90b6('bum): la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang / tshad
90b7('bum): med pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
90b8('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob slob pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la slong slob pa
91a1('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob slob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / 
91a2('bum): mi 'jigs rnams la slob slob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / byams pa chen po la slob slob pa dang / snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
91a3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob
91a4('bum): slob pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnam
91a5('bum): dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa brag kha rjin to// pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi du
91a6('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
91a7('bum): brtan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
91a8('bum): kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka
91b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
91b2('bum): bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / 
91b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyis rten yin no// de dag gis bzod pa
91b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ na thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
91b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brtan par bas
91b6('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sema' dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang me
91b7('bum): dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / 
91b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brten par
92a1('bum): byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rje
92a2('bum): yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
92a3('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i
92a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye
92a5('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
92a6('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chen po stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ 
92a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye
92a8('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko ru shi ka don ngam pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
92b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la phan
92b2('bum): par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi
92b3('bum): dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
92b4('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tham sa cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mtha' las 'das
92b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pazhid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
92b6('bum): thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka thob
92b7('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rjen
92b8('bum): yin no// de dag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
93a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtan par
93a2('bum): byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lnga dang mi dang
93a3('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / 
93a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang me dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rang
93a5('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
93a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u
93a7('bum): shi ka mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi/ 
93a8('bum): rten yin no// de dag gi dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
93b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir
93b2('bum): zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
93b3('bum): bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang // rangs
93b4('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tham sa cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
93b5('bum): la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sang sa rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
93b6('bum): po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi sgra dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u
93b7('bum): ka yang dag par spong ba 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skyeng du
93b8('bum): bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
94a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dbang po rnams
94a2('bum): la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dbang po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lnga dang mi
94a3('bum): dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis stobs rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
94a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten mi na no// de dag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtan pa
94a5('bum): byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten
94a6('bum): yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye shul gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam
94a7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten
94a8('bum): yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
94b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bsam gtan rnams la brtan par byas te/ de tsa
94b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shig bsam gtan 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
94b3('bum): bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshad med pa rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka tshad med pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
94b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
94b5('bum): la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ga/ zugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
94b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
94b7('bum): ko'u shi ka rnam par thar pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
94b8('bum): bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di
95a1('bum): dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rjen yin te// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi
95a2('bum): rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir ne na/ ko'u shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
95a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye
95a4('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnam sa la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ma don par shes pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
95a5('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cadakyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgur bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la
95a6('bum): brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ 
95a7('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / 
95a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang mi lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
95b1('bum): stobs rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
95b2('bum): thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mi 'jigs pa
95b3('bum): 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// 
95b4('bum): de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
95b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis snying rje chen po la ngan
95b6('bum): par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka snying rje chen po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ 
95b7('bum): lha dang mi dang lha yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos
95b8('bum): ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten
96a1('bum): yin no// de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
96a2('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
96a3('bum): brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten
96a4('bum): yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rte na yin no// de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi nga la brtan par byas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rnam
96a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma
96a6('bum): yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brtsa pa// bam po 'argya 'ar gcig pa/ 
96a7('bum): ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun
96a8('bum): mi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag chang byed pa byas te/ de dag la nam mtsho'i bar du rtswa rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi
96b1('bum): byug pa dang / lnga rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ 
96b2('bum): bkur stir byas/ pu dung du byas mchod par byas na/ ko 'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo do'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol
96b3('bum): ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
96b4('bum): pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog par nga/ kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bye da pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston cing / rnam pa thams
96b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'dral la gong du me to ga dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan
96b6('bum): dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams de ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi/ ke'u
96b7('bum): shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'dzam bu gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i
96b8('bum): mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / 
97a1('bum): lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan
97a2('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ pu dung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rig
97a3('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
97a4('bum): stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'ji na pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
97a5('bum): byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral la go da du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa
97a6('bum): dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ de'i bsod
97a7('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
97a8('bum): gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du
97b1('bum): dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad byed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du wa rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi thug pa dang / 
97b2('bum): rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gro
97b3('bum): byas/ bkur stir byas/ pu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin
97b4('bum): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gsheg/ sa pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
97b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang glegs bam du byas te 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang
97b6('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ pu dung du byed / mchod
97b7('bum): bar byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ ko'u shi ka gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs
97b8('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las ras na mchod pa'i phyir stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung du 'ong / rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod
98a1('bum): rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad byed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi matog dang / lha rdzas kyi drang ba
98a2('bum): dang lnga rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang
98a3('bum): lnga rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bu dung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu
98a4('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
98a5('bum): stsal ba/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 
98a6('bum): kun chung bar byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
98a7('bum): ngan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed / phu dung du byeng / mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung du
98a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
98b1('bum): nas mchod pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dang ga tshad byed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag
98b2('bum): la ram 'tshe'i bar du/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi drug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang
98b3('bum): lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi
98b4('bum): ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
98b5('bum): ba mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko ru shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi du so gang na sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dris shing 'dzin pa dang
98b6('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang / brang ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
98b7('bum): mtshan dang / ba dar dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed / bkur stir byed/ pu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka 'jig rten gyi
98b8('bum): khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin ga
99a1('bum): pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'angang du
99a2('bum): dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad byed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa
99a3('bum): lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang
99a4('bum): pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ pu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du
99a5('bum): 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a ngas mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka bas kyang rig
99a6('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang / phreng ba dang
99a7('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed/ 
99a8('bum): bsod nams tshis mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten yongs su bkang ba lta zhog go/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum
99b1('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las sems can re res de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun lnga
99b2('bum): byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad byed pa sha stag byas te/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / 
99b3('bum): lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / 
99b4('bum): rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gor byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
99b5('bum): pa 'di bris shing bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / blags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
99b6('bum): dang yang ma bral bar bya ste/ de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyam sna tshogs kyis
99b7('bum): rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de nyid bsod nams ches mang du 'angal lo// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde
99b8('bum): bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang / bu dung du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis
100a1('bum): pas ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror bgyis pa dang
100a2('bum): bkur stir bgyis pa dang / pu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de
100a3('bum): ngag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyes pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpas
100a4('bum): tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa'am ba skal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang
100a5('bum): lnga rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lga rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna chags kyi
100a6('bum): rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ bu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa
100a7('bum): de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar
100a8('bum): dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang
100b1('bum): lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ 
100b2('bum): bkur stir bgyis/ pu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las
100b3('bum): sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad
100b4('bum): byed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bska la pa'i lhag par lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bre nga ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / 
100b5('bum): lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lhardza sa kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis
100b6('bum): rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig
100b7('bum): mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad
100b8('bum): tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas
101a1('bum): kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lnga rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi bangan dang / lnga rdzas kyi sil
101a2('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ bu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyedan
101a3('bum): sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'ad
101a4('bum): du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad byed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa'am bskal pa'i lhag mar/ lga rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi
101a5('bum): spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha
101a6('bum): rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ pu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
101a7('bum): gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las
101a8('bum): bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba
101b1('bum): dang lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas
101b2('bum): kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ pu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
101b3('bum): ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis
101b4('bum): ba'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phred pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal nga'i lhag mar/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng
101b5('bum): ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi drug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lhardza sa kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / wa
101b6('bum): rdzas kyi ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ bu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
101b7('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che snga
101b8('bum): bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad byed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa'am bskal pa'i lhag mar/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi
102a1('bum): phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyin bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lnga rdzas
102a2('bum): mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dar dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
102a3('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna
102a4('bum): bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang
102a5('bum): lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byu ga pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan
102a6('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ pu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang // steg gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
102a7('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las
102a8('bum): bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / 
102b1('bum): swarnga kyi spos dang / lnga rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / sil skam
102b2('bum): tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ bu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar dgongs/ de'i slad du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma
102b3('bum): de dag gis bsod nams mang du 'phel ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka mang ngo // brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs
102b4('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / de la me tog
102b5('bum): dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ 
102b6('bum): bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i
102b7('bum): nang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/ 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa
102b8('bum): bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi nga
103a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
103a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
103a3('bum): nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
103a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
103a5('bum): dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi/ yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
103a6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par
103a7('bum): thar par brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
103a8('bum): ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa
103b1('bum): shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ste// de la bslabs shing
103b2('bum): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// phyin
103b3('bum): to// phyin par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu dgu'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang
103b4('bum): po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// 
103b5('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing
103b6('bum): gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir
103b7('bum): byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med
103b8('bum): dpag tu med par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
104a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
104a2('bum): phyin pa las byung ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 
104a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ nang stong pa nyid do// shes
104a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ phyi stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung bani/ 
104a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ chen po stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ don dam pa stong pa
104a6('bum): nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol
104a7('bum): tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
104a8('bum): pa las byung ba ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ chos thams
104b1('bum): cang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// shes
104b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
104b3('bum): las byung ba ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
104b4('bum): byung ba ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 
104b5('bum): dbang po rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
104b6('bum): so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
104b7('bum): so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bsam gtan rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ tshad med pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
104b8('bum): pa las byung ba ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
105a1('bum): byin pa las byung ba ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam par thar pa'i
105a2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung
105a3('bum): ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
105a4('bum): rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// shes
105a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byams pa chen de'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ snying rje chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
105a6('bum): byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
105a7('bum): pa las byung ba ni/ sems can yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid
105a8('bum): do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ko'u shi ka/ 
105b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung
105b2('bum): ba ni theg pa chen po'o// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
105b3('bum): bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
105b4('bum): yid la byed cing / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan
105b5('bum): sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ bsod nam sa mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la/ bsod nams mngon
105b6('bum): par 'du bya ba snga mas/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba
105b7('bum): brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi
105b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// chos dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun dkon
106a1('bum): mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi rnams 'jig rten du
106a2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shA
106a3('bum): pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
106a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten
106a5('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'a/ jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig
106a6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
106a7('bum): 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dzag rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
106a8('bum): ro/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'thung
106b1('bum): bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
106b2('bum): bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
106b3('bum): 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams
106b4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnam sa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig
