106b5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnam sa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 
106b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs
106b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig
106b8('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
107a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jim
107a2('bum): rjer du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten pa 'a
107a3('bum): bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du
107a4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de srid du rgyal rigs
107a5('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'a/ byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho
107a6('bum): ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzho'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
107a7('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan
107a8('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lnga nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar cu
107b1('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
107b2('bum): chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge
107b3('bum): ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge rgyas kyi lha
107b4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams 'ji garten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams
107b5('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi gdung
107b6('bum): ba'i lha rnams 'jig rjen du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og min
107b7('bum): gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa
107b8('bum): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ba yod// 
108a1('bum): bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod ngo do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod do// sems can yongs su smin pa yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
108a2('bum): su dag pa yod do// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe me'i lha rnams dang / 
108a3('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye pan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'a
108a4('bum): gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs tshan gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi lha rnams dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge
108a5('bum): ba'i lha rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang // che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshang
108a6('bum): med che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 
108a7('bum): 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
108a8('bum): pa bcang byar bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
108b1('bum): phyin pa tshul bzhin du yin la bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas
108b2('bum): pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma
108b3('bum): chang la/ grogs po dag chos kyi tshul rgyun ma chad de/ grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ spyi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha
108b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
108b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
108b6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung ba ra 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'a gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
108b7('bum): 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus
108b8('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
109a1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa'ing 'jig rten du
109a2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
109a3('bum): bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten
109a4('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'a jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten
109a5('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan
109a6('bum): lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa
109a7('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 
109a8('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i sdoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung
109b1('bum): bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
109b2('bum): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung chug/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du
109b3('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig
109b4('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig
109b5('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ro// dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
109b6('bum): rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la
109b7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
109b8('bum): 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / thab mo bya'o// sum cu rtsa
110a1('bum): gsum gyi lha rnams dang tsham bsngal lo snyam na/ de'i tshe ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis soms la kha thor gyis
110a2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang / des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa de dag smos shing rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu
110a3('bum): mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/ nam bdag cag ngan song du skye ba mthong na yang / ko'u shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha thon du gyis shig dang / de dag gis
110a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas lha'i gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka
110a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa ni de ltar don dang / ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am gang su yang rung ste/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
110a6('bum): pa 'di thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci
110a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de
110a8('bum): ngag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin
110b1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la bslabs shing bla
110b2('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
110b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ bla na med
110b4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos
110b5('bum): kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'das so// 
110b6('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs sngags chen mo'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
110b7('bum): ni bla na med pa'i rigs sngags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rigs sngagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
110b8('bum): 'das don 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka
111a1('bum): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs sngags cheran mo'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
111a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rigs sngags so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rigs sngags so// de ci'i phyir
111a3('bum): zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang rigs sngags 'di nyid la
111a4('bum): brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma byo na pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
111a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rig snga gas 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
111a6('bum): 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
111a7('bum): 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka
111a8('bum): do ni 'di ltar rig sngags 'di yong na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod
111b1('bum): pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na
111b2('bum): yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig
111b3('bum): rten na/ yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod
111b4('bum): nga yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten yod pa yin// phyi nang stong pa nyi nga 'jig rten yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig
111b5('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin
111b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dor ba
111b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nying 'jig
111b8('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos
112a1('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nying 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ji
112a2('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag
112a3('bum): rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams
112a4('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam pa ra thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
112a5('bum): smon pa med pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par she sa pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
112a6('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig
112a7('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi
112a8('bum): dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod ba yin/ ma nor de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzhan ma
112b1('bum): yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos skyon med pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mig
112b2('bum): lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na
112b3('bum): yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig
112b4('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// 
112b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' yod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod ba yin/ 
112b6('bum): bsam gtan pa ni 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod
112b7('bum): pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na
112b8('bum): gdags su yin pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi nga
113a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rjen nag
113a2('bum): su yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin
113a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus
113a4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig
113a5('bum): rjer na gdags su yod pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'a jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong ba nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chos tha
113a6('bum): cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten/ gdags su yod pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin
113a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su
113a8('bum): yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'ji
113b1('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na
113b2('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam
113b3('bum): par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
113b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na gdag sa su yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na
113b5('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rna mas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mi 'jig sa pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 
113b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gangs
113b7('bum): su yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
113b8('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnam
114a1('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de
114a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin no// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na rtsi dang rgyu skar
114a3('bum): dang skar ma thams cad gdags su yong ngo // ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yong na dge ba'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi las
114a4('bum): dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong
114a5('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge
114a6('bum): 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsi thams cad gdags su yod do// slob pa dang / 
114a7('bum): mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad kyang gdags su yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
114a8('bum): kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshes ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshen yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems
114b1('bum): tsan rnams la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
114b2('bum): dang / theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
114b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab
114b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang
114b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las
114b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa steng po nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams
114b7('bum): cang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spong pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
114b8('bum): la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
115a1('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam
115a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
115a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
115a4('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang // mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
115a5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas
115a6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
115a7('bum): zhing yang yongs su dag par byed pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa
115a8('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de yang shes rab kyipa
115b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun
115b2('bum): chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol
115b3('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rims kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul gzhin
115b4('bum): du yid la bgyid pa de/ tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang / ldan bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes
115b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klo/ pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin
115b6('bum): nga ma gtogs par dug gis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mtshon gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mes dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// chus dus byed par mi 'gyur ba nas nang brgya rtsa gcig gi
115b7('bum): bar gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang bla nas gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha thon byed cing / 
115b8('bum): rgyal po'i bro brang du song na/ de la glags tshol ba de dag gis glags mi rnyed de/ rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam 'dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing
116a1('bum): dga' bar bya bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid dang mthus de ltar sems so// gal te rigs
116a2('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha thon byed cing rgyal po'i bro brang du song na/ de la rgyal po'i bu 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig
116a3('bum): gis gtam 'dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
116a4('bum): gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag/ snying rje'i sems dang dga' ba'i se mas dang / btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar bzhag pa'i
116a5('bum): phyir te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 
116a6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam
116a7('bum): yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ bsam gang na bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol
116a8('bum): tu phyin pa drug dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang
116b1('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
116b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
116b3('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
116b4('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sang sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyu ro// de sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon
116b5('bum): lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par nam yang sems can dmyal bar mi skye/ byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o// de nam yang
116b6('bum): yan lag nyams pa can du mi 'gyur/ nam yang dngul po'i rigs su mi skye/ smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ sme sha can gyi rigs sam/ mgar ba 'am/ phyag da
116b7('bum): ba 'am/ shen pa 'am/ phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/ dmangs rigs su mi skye ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
116b8('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag du rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang byang chub
117a1('bum): sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / 
117a2('bum): bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sems can
117a3('bum): rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun sum tshogs
117a4('bum): par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ga zung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya/ rnam pa thams
117a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bya ste/ de ngag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ 
117a6('bum): tshe 'di'i yon tan dang tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u'i shu'o// 
117a7('bum): de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba glags lta ba'i bsam pa car brgya tsam zhig/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sem
117a8('bum): par gyur te/ mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba brgya po glags lnga ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na der dong na/ de la bdag gis ji nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
117b1('bum): phyin pa brjod pas/ mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis drung du dong nas/ bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bcom ldan 'dalas shes rab kyi pha
117b2('bum): rol phyin pa 'di las ji snyed cig gzung ba de dag kha thon du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji snyed
117b3('bum): bzung ba de dag kha thon tu brjod do// de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas lam de
117b4('bum): nyid dang sgo nga nyid nas phyir dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/ de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po ring po nas
117b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir deng na/ de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
117b6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni lha'i dbang po brgya bir gyis
117b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas/ de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ nga la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya ste/ 
117b8('bum): lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam la yang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pa ma mthong ste/ 
118a1('bum): mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa klubs lta ba'i bsam pa car sha stag ste/ 'khor
118a2('bum): 'dir 'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud du bcas pa/ tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu
118a3('bum): nang na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ zhe sdang ba'i sems dang glags lta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro ba ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha rang
118a4('bum): ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte/ na gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 
118a5('bum): 'drung dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa ku na 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung sna
118a6('bum): dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge pa dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che
118a7('bum): dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yod pa
118a8('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
118b1('bum): byin pa las byung ba sha stag go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
118b2('bum): 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
118b3('bum): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'adi yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i
118b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// lho phyogs kyi 'a jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 
118b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang ba ces pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang
118b6('bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / shes rab kyi
118b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
118b8('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
119a1('bum): dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lha 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig
119a2('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba
119a3('bum): sha stag to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 
119a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / 
119a5('bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de ngag thams cad kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
119a6('bum): de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas ba
119a7('bum): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
119a8('bum): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs
119b1('bum): su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
119b2('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
119b3('bum): dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang
119b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// lho nub kyi
119b5('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs
119b6('bum): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye che
119b7('bum): po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol
119b8('bum): tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
120a1('bum): 'dun dang / bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
120a2('bum): spyir dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
120a3('bum): yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
120a4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
120a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' ldi nga dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed
120a6('bum): cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
120a7('bum): byung ba sha stag go// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhug
120a8('bum): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / rnam par lding dang / mi 'a
120b1('bum): dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni
120b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems dpar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
120b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon tu gyur pa las 'dir ni gdon mi za bar/ byang chub
120b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyu ra gyis/ de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
120b5('bum): der song te/ bar chad bya'o snyam nas/ bdud sdig totsan gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par smra la nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod pa
120b6('bum): gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na
120b7('bum): ba der 'gro bar 'dod la bdud sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi rnam par bkod pa 'di ni/ rgyal po 'bri 'bris ra'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas
120b8('bum): kyang de tsam mi phod/ rgyal po snga rab 'ang ma byed dang / shAkya rnams dang / li tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi pong de bdud sdig
121a1('bum): to can 'di ni yun ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la yang glags lnga zhing glags tshol/ sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la yang / 
121a2('bum): ba'i bsam pa can yin gyis/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag
121a3('bum): par bsams te/ dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar bdang sdig te can de dag
121a4('bum): lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir log go// de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis/ lha rdzas
121a5('bum): kyi me tog dang / na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas ba ra snang gyi nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
121a6('bum): ba der mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring por spyod par gyur cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi
121a7('bum): mi 'di dag ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i
121a8('bum): chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod
121b1('bum): pa de srid du/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
121b2('bum): nga'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o// byang chub sems dpa'
121b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur zhe'o// phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dris
121b4('bum): shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs da ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o// phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o// de nas
121b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de la las 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// deng bzhin te/ lnga'i
121b6('bum): bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
121b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
121b8('bum): rjen gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khatshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i
122a1('bum): chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
122a2('bum): spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yang yod par 'gyur ro// phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 
122a3('bum): 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so// phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar ngas shes so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po mngon
122a4('bum): par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
122a5('bum): ba 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha glags tshol
122a6('bum): ba rnams kyis glags mi snyed do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// 
122a7('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi
122a8('bum): ba de ni ston pa 'am/ ston pa dang mtshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
122b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni
122b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba dpa' ba dang ldan pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing
122b3('bum): kur chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
122b4('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas
122b5('bum): mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba
122b6('bum): dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i
122b7('bum): slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams
122b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ 
123a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
123a2('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
123a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka re de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
123a4('bum): rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni
123a5('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes
123a6('bum): rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 
123a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gcig go// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
123a8('bum): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod par mdzad
123b1('bum): de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar brtson 'grus
123b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin dri yid yA yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pI ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pa
123b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad
123b4('bum): de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi ming
123b5('bum): yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar don dam paste/ ngo ba nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod
123b6('bum): pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar
123b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid
123b8('bum): kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod
124a1('bum): pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod par
124a2('bum): mdzad/ de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji
124a3('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa/ de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ming
124a4('bum): yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi na nga pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dbang po rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad// de ltar
124a5('bum): stobs rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
124a6('bum): brgyad pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa/ de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su
124a7('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad// de ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi ming yang yongasu brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar tshad med pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzugs med pa'i
124a8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa/ de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ming lang
124b1('bum): yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nying dang / mtshan ma med
124b2('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ming yang yongs
124b3('bum): su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa/ de ltar de bzhin gtso
124b4('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ming
124b5('bum): yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar snying rje chen po'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjed pa
124b6('bum): ma mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
124b7('bum): chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
124b8('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
125a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
125a2('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o// kun tu 'dren pa'o// dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
125a3('bum): nga yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das don ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i
125a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams
125a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bzod pa badz+ra da pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka'
125a6('bum): stsal pa// de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
125a7('bum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ 
125a8('bum): nam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying du yongs su ma sngos pa'i shes
125b1('bum): rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin
125b2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
125b3('bum): du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
125b4('bum): phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
125b5('bum): nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis
125b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul da/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
125b7('bum): nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni tshul khrims
125b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin
126a1('bum): no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul
126a2('bum): dang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
126a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong
126a4('bum): su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam
126a5('bum): gtan ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam
126a6('bum): gtan ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// 
126a7('bum): mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
126a8('bum): 'das ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha
126b1('bum): rog tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i
126b2('bum): tshul khrims ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
126b3('bum): zhing du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
126b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i ba rtson 'grus ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye
126b5('bum): ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ 
126b6('bum): ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni shes rab
126b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes gnyis su med pa'i
126b8('bum): tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mig gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rna ba gnyis su meng pa'i tshul dang / 
127a1('bum): sna gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lce gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lus gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / yid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / gzugs gnyis
127a2('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang / sgra gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dri gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / ro gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / reg gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / chos gnyis su med pa'i tshul
127a3('bum): dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par she pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par
127a4('bum): pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis
127a5('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med
127a6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i
127a7('bum): tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
127a8('bum): tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 
127b1('bum): sa'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 
127b2('bum): nam mkha'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 
127b3('bum): rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / tshor
127b4('bum): ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sred pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / len pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / srid pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba gnyis su me
127b5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rga shi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i
127b6('bum): tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su mang ba'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med
127b7('bum): nga'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
127b8('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa 'ang gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa zhing gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul
128a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pazhing gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa'ang gnyis su
128a2('bum): med pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis su med
128a3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su meng ba'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul
128a4('bum): dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma
128a5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
128a6('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / stobs rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul da
128a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang
128a8('bum): tshad med pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams gnyis su mang ba'i tshul dang / 
128b1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gnyis su med pa'i
128b2('bum): tshul dang / mngon par shes rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin
128b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / snying
128b4('bum): rje chen po gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i
128b5('bum): tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyisu med pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul
128b6('bum): dang / rang byang chub gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs gnyis
128b7('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du shes gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
128b8('bum): dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna gnyis su
129a1('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce gnyisu ma mchis pa tshul dang / ji ltar lus gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid gnas sa ma ma
129a2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sgra gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dri gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ro gnyis su ma
129a3('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar reg bya gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / 
129a4('bum): ji ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis su pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma ma chis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis
129a5('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi rnam par shes ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
129a6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa dang / ji
129a7('bum): lngar lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / 
129a8('bum): ji ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus
129b1('bum): the reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
129b2('bum): tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
129b3('bum): chu'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar me'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rlung gi khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar na mkha'i kham
129b4('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du
129b5('bum): byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs gnyis su ma mchis nga'i tshul dang / ji ltar
129b6('bum): skye mched drug gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sred pa gnyis su ma mchis
129b7('bum): nga'i tshul dang / ji ltar len pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar srid pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rga shi gnyis
129b8('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bzod
130a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan
130a2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid gnyis ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / 
130a3('bum): ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
130a4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
130a5('bum): tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar thog
130a6('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
130a7('bum): tshul dang / ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
130a8('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa zhid gnyis su ma mchos pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dngos po med
130b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhog pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yang dag par spong pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis
130b2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dbang po rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar stobs rnams gnyis su ma mchis
130b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags
130b4('bum): ba'i bden pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshad med pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa tshul
130b5('bum): dang / ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rna mas gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam pa ra thar pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
130b6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gnyis su ma mchis
130b7('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyis su
130b8('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar so so yang
131a1('bum): par rig pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar snying rje chen po gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya
131a2('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / 
131a3('bum): ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / 
131a4('bum): ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par
131a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis lags// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// ba po
131a6('bum): ra bsam pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis
131a7('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dgaganyi su med de gnyis su byar med do// 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis
131a8('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du shes dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
131b1('bum): 'du byed dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dang pa
131b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// mig ni mig gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mig dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis
131b3('bum): su byar med do// rna ba ni rna bas ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// sna ni snas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
131b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar sna dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su me de gnyis su byar med do// lce ni lces stong ste/ de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis
131b5('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do// lus ni lus kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 
131b6('bum): yid ni yid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
131b7('bum): de ni 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// sgra ni sgras stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sgra dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis
131b8('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do// dri ni dris stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ro ni ros stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
132a1('bum): nan dzin 'dis 'od 'dzin pa dag gnyis su dang da gnas su pa med do//  sa yim da /  ba na/ ma ngas
132a2('bum): reg dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// chos ni chos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med
132a3('bum): gnyis su byar ming ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
132a4('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam pa shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang pa
132a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar me ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa sa stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam
132a6('bum): par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byang rang ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ doni 'di ltar lce
132a7('bum): rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis meng de gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir nam/ don 'di lta
132a8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byang med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas spong ste/ de ci'i phyir
132b1('bum): zhe na/ don 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i
132b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i
132b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyir pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
132b4('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
