160a8('bum): zhing stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 
160b1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhing nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
160b2('bum): pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam
160b3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 
160b4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub
160b5('bum): pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mchin ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting
160b6('bum): 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 
160b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
160b8('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang
161a1('bum): chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no// brgya byin gyi
161a2('bum): smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 
161a3('bum): so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos
161a4('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgru
161a5('bum): pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 
161a6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
161a7('bum): phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrur
161a8('bum): pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar smra
161b1('bum): pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin
161b2('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma
161b3('bum): yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
161b4('bum): pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rna mas nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma
161b5('bum): yin stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi ya na lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags
161b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar
161b7('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
161b8('bum): mi med pa dang / smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub
162a1('bum): pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
162a2('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig/ 
162a3('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra ba tsam pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam
162a4('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
162a5('bum): yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi
162a6('bum): gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su
162a7('bum): shes par bya ba ma yin te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis
162a8('bum): pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma
162b1('bum): yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ ko'u shi ka legs so legs so// de de bzhin te/ 
162b2('bum): ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
162b3('bum): phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ 
162b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyi sa pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
162b5('bum): pa ming gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhi sa su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i
162b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa
162b7('bum): de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do
162b8('bum): ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dong pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / 
163a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa
163a2('bum): de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
163a3('bum): ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
163a4('bum): phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'a dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// 
163a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i
163a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de
163a7('bum): la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka/ 
163a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dong pa do ni/ de bzhin/ 
163b1('bum): nying la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson
163b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dong pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de
163b3('bum): la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u sho ka de
163b4('bum): ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyi da de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de
163b5('bum): ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su
163b6('bum): byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol
163b7('bum): tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su
163b8('bum): 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsams
164a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyi su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de
164a2('bum): la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi
164a3('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag
164a4('bum): pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
164a5('bum): ngo ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ga nyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko' shi ka don 'ang
164a6('bum): lngar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang
164a7('bum): dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
164a8('bum): ngo ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dong ba de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du zang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di la
164b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ 
164b2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
164b3('bum): de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du
164b4('bum): zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtso na 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 
164b5('bum): ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'a dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyi sa su 'dong du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka don
164b6('bum): 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su
164b7('bum): 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa
164b8('bum): dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du zad
165a1('bum): de tso'i phyim nen/ ko'u shi ga ngon 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 
165a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/  de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
165a3('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ de la bslabs pas ni/ byang chub sems
165a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par
165a5('bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe ba ngag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ der lha'i bu gang ji
165a6('bum): snyed bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod par bgyid de/ nam bdag der ma mchis shing stan de la mchis pa de'i tshe'ang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing / lnga'i dang
165a7('bum): po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
165a8('bum): du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha thon du bgyis cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa der phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang
165b1('bum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
165b2('bum): rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol
165b3('bum): tu phyin pa la phyag bgyi zhing gdung pa bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
165b4('bum): su bsgrub pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol
165b5('bum): tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bzhir gyur/ to// rgyur gyur to// rkyen tu gyur to// yongs su sgrub pa 'gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas mtshang gnyis las bdag
165b6('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha thon bgyid
165b7('bum): pa de'i tshe/ 'jigs pa 'am bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ 
165b8('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma
166a1('bum): ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
166a2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
166a3('bum): ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// 
166a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos
166a5('bum): su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchi rtags ma marmi/ sngo du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos
166a6('bum): su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// 
166a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi
166a8('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa
166b1('bum): nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni
166b2('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma
166b3('bum): ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma
166b4('bum): ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong
166b5('bum): pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
166b6('bum): 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// / 
166b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
166b8('bum): ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis ma ste/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa
167a1('bum): 'di ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
167a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams
167a3('bum): cad stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan
167a4('bum): nying stong pa 'di ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma ma ches brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs
167a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
167a6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa
167a7('bum): nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po med
167a8('bum): nga'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dras
167b1('bum): banye bar gzhag pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang
167b2('bum): dag par spong ba rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul
167b3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni
167b4('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma ma chis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma
167b5('bum): mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnam sa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag
167b6('bum): rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags
167b7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
167b8('bum): 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam
168a1('bum): gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshang med pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
168a2('bum): ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa
168a3('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod
168a4('bum): du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
168a5('bum): ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma thar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i
168a6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa na mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / 
168a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bco
168a8('bum): ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
168b1('bum): 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchi gul mchig rjodu ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni smos
168b2('bum): su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
168b3('bum): stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams
168b4('bum): ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das so so yang
168b5('bum): dag par rig pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma ma chis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das snying
168b6('bum): rje chen po ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sangs
168b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
168b8('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das las
169a1('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod dus
169a2('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ 
169a3('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang // 
169a4('bum): rjodang du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma ngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan
169a5('bum): ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi bsdu na te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
169a6('bum): phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis/ smos su ma mchis pas de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa
169a7('bum): dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la
169a8('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan to// bcom ldan 'das de bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
169b1('bum): ni lnga dang mi dang lda ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
169b2('bum): kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dung dang / mchod pa bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
169b3('bum): mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dud dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu
169b4('bum): phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub pa dang // tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / 
169b5('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ pu dung du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na de ni nam
169b6('bum): bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / 
169b7('bum): gzhin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi ngogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i ngogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral
169b8('bum): bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang phreng ba dang
170a1('bum): spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dung
170a2('bum): dang mchod pa bgyid cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin
170a3('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byung bur bltam pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang bris te stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni shes ra
170a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams
170a5('bum): ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ri ma gror bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / pu dud du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am
170a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dang du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na log par ltung ba dang / ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i phun sum
170a7('bum): gas pa med nas/ smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
170a8('bum): bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni mi 'dra' ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
170b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin
170b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la zhugs te mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshogs su bcad pa dang / 
170b3('bum): ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa
170b4('bum): gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub pa ra bgyis te gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma
170b5('bum): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di la sa byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung
170b6('bum): ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar
170b7('bum): 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar
170b8('bum): phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 
171a1('bum): nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
171a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin ga
171a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub byang gi phyogs
171a4('bum): mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
171a5('bum): rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs
171a6('bum): te/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos
171a7('bum): rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing
171a8('bum): kun chub par bgyis te gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ 
171b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad ba dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du
171b2('bum): brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs par brjod pa dang / chos gtan la phab pa bstan pa'o// 
171b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang 'gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
171b4('bum): de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtsha na dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / 
171b5('bum): bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod par bgyis pa dang / sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phyem
171b6('bum): ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dung dang / mchod pa bgyis par yang mi 'dra' ba ma mchis
171b7('bum): so de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
171b8('bum): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa de ni sems
172a1('bum): can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi ngogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi ngogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// 
172a2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par
172a3('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to// 'chang ngo klog go// kun chub par bgyid do// tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do// bris
172a4('bum): pa de la yang me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim
172a5('bum): grong bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid de bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni/ 'jigs pa thams cad zhi ba
172a6('bum): pa'o// nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
172a7('bum): dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
172a8('bum): kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dung dang / mchod par bgyid pa des ni gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dog pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu nor
172b1('bum): gyi bdag po zhig gis 'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la rten na rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la rten pas sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas de dag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur
172b2('bum): ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po de la rten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la rten pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
172b3('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
172b4('bum): pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das de ba sa na bdag gis cha de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ngo ci'i slad
172b5('bum): du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdu nga rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs
172b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'o// 'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// 
172b7('bum): 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob bo// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin
172b8('bum): gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi stong
173a1('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bris shing rim gro da
173a2('bum): bkur sti dang / pu dud dang / mchod par bgyid pa de dag du mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg
173a3('bum): pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa
173a4('bum): ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/ shes
173a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o// com ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che che
173a6('bum): po mi dpogs rin ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der mi ma lags pa
173a7('bum): kyis klags mi rnyeng ngo // mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am bud med kyang nor bu rin po che de bstan na mi ma lags pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod de nur du 'pho zhing mi
173a8('bum): gnas so// mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de brtags na mkhris pa de'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rlung gis mnar pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na rlung nga'ang
173b1('bum): 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na bang kan de yang zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na
173b2('bum): 'dus pa'i bro da'ang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par mi 'phel lo// nub mo ni snang bar bgyid do// tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do// 
173b3('bum): grang ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de dro bar bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de'ang ha cang yang mi dro/ ha cang
173b4('bum): yang mi grang zhing ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dog sa'i phrogs der sbrul lam de ma lags pa'i sdig pa las sogs
173b5('bum): pa gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am bud med la la zhig sbrul gdugs pas zin pa la nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na nges de mthong
173b6('bum): ma thag du/ dug de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa 'am bud med la la zhig 'brum bus btab pa
173b7('bum): mig rab rib can du gyur te/ mig gi nang dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nang dam/ lce'i nang ngam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad cig byung ba las/ de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de
173b8('bum): brtags na de dag gi 'brum bu 'am/ rab rib bam/ mig gi nang ngam/ rna ba'i nang ngam/ sna'i nang ngam/ lce'i nang ngam/ lkog ma'i nang ngam/ lus kyi nang de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
174a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de chang rnyog ma can gyi nang dus
174a2('bum): na/ de'i mo la chab de thams cad kyang / yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos sngon pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de
174a3('bum): yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de
174a4('bum): gos dmar pos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de 'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dkar pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab
174a5('bum): de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos leb rgan gyis dkris te chab kyi nang / du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal
174a6('bum): te nor bu rin po che chen po de shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyis dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// de dag dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po che chen
174a7('bum): po de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// chab de la rnyog pa mchis pa'ang nor bu rin po che chen po des 'dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen
174a8('bum): po de ni yon tan gyis rnam pa de lta bu dag dang gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang 'a
174b1('bum): bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du
174b2('bum): sems nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/ 'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la yang yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa dga' bo nor bu rin po che de
174b3('bum): ni lha rdzas te/ btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che gang yod pa de dag ni chung zhing lci/ lha rdzas kyi nong du rin po che chen po de dag ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi
174b4('bum): mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po
174b5('bum): che'i grangs sam cha'am bgrang ba 'am dpe 'am rgyur yang na bar mi 'gro'o// de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
174b6('bum): 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du stsal stsal pa las snod de nas phyag yang snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchi bar 'gyur te gzhan yang snod de la mos pa
174b7('bum): bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa/ de'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gi lus sam sems kyi sdug bsngal dang gnod pa
174b8('bum): mi las gyur pa 'am/ mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla
175a1('bum): dag so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod
175a2('bum): par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bas
175a3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
175a4('bum): bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod ngo do// bcom lnga na 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
175a5('bum): byin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshe gas pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol
175a6('bum): tu phyin pa'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
175a7('bum): snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
175a8('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
175b1('bum): phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod
175b2('bum): par bgyi ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan
175b3('bum): lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa
175b4('bum): nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi snod
175b5('bum): ngo/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
175b6('bum): pa sku gdung de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
175b7('bum): so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyi snod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ don dam pa stong pa
175b8('bum): nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
176a1('bum): par bgyi ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom
176a2('bum): ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus
176a3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma
176a4('bum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ma tha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig
176a5('bum): brjod par bgyis te/ thog ma dang tha ma mang pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi
176a6('bum): snod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
176a7('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma
176a8('bum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ 
176b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
176b2('bum): nyid kyi yon tan ni lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ska du dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
176b3('bum): stong ngo // bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyis te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan na tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
176b4('bum): ba'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ dngos po med pa
176b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod nga / bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
176b6('bum): yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ nga bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshed ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi snong ngo // bcom ldan
176b7('bum): 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad mi mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
176b8('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
177a1('bum): pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang
177a2('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag par
177a3('bum): spong ba rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
177a4('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga'i yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyis te/ dbang po rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad
177a5('bum): ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das stob sa lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ stobs
177a6('bum): rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
177a7('bum): par bgyis te/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
177a8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod pa bgyis te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gabye
177b1('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ 'phags
177b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi'i
177b3('bum): yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ bsam gtan rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi snod ngo // 
177b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed ci ga brjod par bgyis te/ tshad med pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
177b5('bum): ngag kyang tshad med pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'angs gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzugs meng ba'i
177b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das
177b7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa
177b8('bum): rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis banas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
178a1('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das
178a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
178a3('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnam
178a4('bum): kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed
178a5('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das ba
178a6('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do// 
178a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
178a8('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni
178b1('bum): tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste
178b2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i
178b3('bum): yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang snying rje chen po'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das
178b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
178b5('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thams cad
178b6('bum): shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta snyed
178b7('bum): cig brjod par ci ste lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
178b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam
179a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon ma mi tshang ma mchis
179a2('bum): so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin nyid kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan
179a3('bum): ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod ngo do// bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par
179a4('bum): bgyi ste/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ga zhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos
179a5('bum): nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos nyi dkyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos nyid kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan
179a6('bum): 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi snod ngo // 
179a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi
179a8('bum): gnas nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
179b1('bum): ba'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// 
179b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gyis
179b3('bum): mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bag chags kyi mtshams
179b4('bum): sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyi mtshams skyo ra ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma
179b5('bum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das rtag tu btang
179b6('bum): snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rtag tu btang
179b7('bum): snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi nyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
179b8('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi nyam pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
180a1('bum): gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ba
180a2('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// 
180a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye mi 'gag pa'i snod de de bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das
180a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o/ 
180a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa dbri ba dang bsnan pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'
180a6('bum): 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
180a7('bum): dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid kyi snod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa
180a8('bum): chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mdza' 'o// gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong
180b1('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byung bur yongs su bltam pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye
180b2('bum): ma snyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byung bur bltam pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las
180b3('bum): bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa 'di cing len to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
180b4('bum): kyi sku gdung rnams te/ mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mang
180b5('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror ba gyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / pu dung du bgyid pa
180b6('bum): dang / mchod par bgyid pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing / rgyal rigs che zhin mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba
180b7('bum): 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/ mtshe ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du
180b8('bum): mi dang / lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du
181a1('bum): bas kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / blags shing kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du ying la bgyis na/ ting
181a2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chu
181a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid
181a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
181a5('bum): par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
181a6('bum): bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// der ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su
181a7('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
181a8('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa
181b1('bum): 'gyur ro// dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs
181b2('bum): par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag
181b3('bum): bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bani
181b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bani yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'ju ga pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa
181b5('bum): brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
181b6('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sku
181b7('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa
181b8('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ched du bsams te
182a1('bum): lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing mthong
182a2('bum): 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam/ brgya byin gyis gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal so po'i gzugs
182a3('bum): kyang rung ste lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur
182a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ byang chu ba sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas/ 
182a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag de bzhin gshe gas pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lag
182a6('bum): glo ba ma ches pa'ang ma mchis/ mchod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags/ gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring
182a7('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dud dang / bgying bar bgyis na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/ pun
182a8('bum): sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu rung dang / mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// 
182b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed
182b2('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
182b3('bum): pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyis te
182b4('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nges ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'ji garten gyi khams dang / grangs dang tshang ma mchis pa'i nge ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
182b5('bum): sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nges chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par
182b6('bum): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab
182b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung bar bgyi bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du
182b8('bum): yang yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid de/ gnyis gang zhe na 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ngo // 
183a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang steng pa'i
183a2('bum): kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas
183a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong
183a4('bum): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa ste
183a5('bum): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag
183a6('bum): par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags
183a7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs med pa'i sgo
183a8('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
183b1('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin
183b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
183b3('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas
183b4('bum): pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi
183b5('bum): chos nyid ces bgyi'o// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas
183b6('bum): pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis
183b7('bum): pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/ chos thams cad gyi dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de// 
183b8('bum): 'di ni 'dus ma bya ci chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs
184a1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang
184a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig
184a3('bum): 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i
184a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang
184a5('bum): chos ston pa de dag kyang shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'das pa'i
184a6('bum): dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
184a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
184a8('bum): nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtan te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
184b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob ngo bo// 
184b2('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi
184b3('bum): khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rang byang chub thob bo// 'thong
184b4('bum): bo thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po tham sa cad rgya cher bstan te dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
184b5('bum): dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang
184b6('bum): ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / len pa med pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang / bstan pa med pa'i
184b7('bum): tshul dang / blang ba med pa'i tshul dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ ngor dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
184b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin// 
185a1('bum): gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ @
185a2('bum): rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin// 
185a3('bum): da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
185a4('bum): chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams te bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha
185a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub ba ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma
185a6('bum): yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// 
185a7('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// dam pa brgya nyer drug pa// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
185a8('bum): phyin pa 'di ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni sems can thams
185b1('bum): cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'ang 'tshal te/ sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
185b2('bum): sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// srog tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'gro bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchi
185b3('bum): so/ gang zag du dmigs pa ma mchis so// shed can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// shed bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// byed pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba
185b4('bum): por dmigs pa ma mchis so// shes pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
185b5('bum): tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du shes su dmig sa pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchi sa so// rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis
185b6('bum): so// mig du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// snar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lcer dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus su dmigs pa ma
185b7('bum): mchis so// yid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// slar dmigs pa ma mchis so// drir dmigs pa ma mchis so// ror dmigs pa ma
