185b8('bum): mchis so// reg tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma
186a1('bum): mchis so// sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes par dmig
186a2('bum): ba ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
186a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg par
186a4('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma
186a5('bum): mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi
186a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
186a7('bum): chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// me'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// na mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis
186a8('bum): so// rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmigs pa mamachi
186b1('bum): so// ming dang gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// skye mched drug du dmigs pa ma mchis so// reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sred par
186b2('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// len par dmigs pa ma mchis so// srid par dmigs pa ma mchis so// skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so// sbyin
186b3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// brtson
186b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma
186b5('bum): mchis so// nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyi nang ste/ nga ba nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong
186b6('bum): pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma
186b7('bum): mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma
186b8('bum): mchis so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang gi
187a1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis
187a2('bum): so/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
187a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// dbang po rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// stobs rnams su
187a4('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phagra
187a5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs med pa'i
187a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma
187a7('bum): mchis so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
187a8('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi 'jigs
187b1('bum): pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
187b2('bum): su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
187b3('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub du dmigs pa ma mchis so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
187b4('bum): byang chub du dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas su dmig sa pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs
187b5('bum): pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs
187b6('bum): par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi
187b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyad pas nges byang chub kyang mi dmigs na sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lta'ang ci smos/ brgya byin
187b8('bum): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi// de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam
188a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la yang de mi dmigs
188a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs
188a3('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so// bzod pa yang mi dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs so// gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyang mi dmagra
188a4('bum): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/ le lo yang mi dmigs so// bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/ 'khrug
188a5('bum): pa yang mi dmigs so// shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/ shes rab 'chal ba yang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka 'od kyang shes
188a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul
188a7('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs
188a8('bum): pa'i tshul dang / lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dri mi dmigs
188b1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par
188b2('bum): pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul
188b3('bum): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
188b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa 'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i
188b5('bum): tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i
188b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
188b7('bum): ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i
188b8('bum): tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs
189a1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang #
189a2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
189a3('bum): len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs
189a4('bum): pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi na pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
189a5('bum): tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang
189a6('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
189a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
189a8('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
189b1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul
189b2('bum): dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med
189b3('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
189b4('bum): pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po lnga mi dmi gas pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
189b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmig sa pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs pa'i
189b6('bum): tshul dang / tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i
189b7('bum): tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi darig
189b8('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
190a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi
190a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs
190a3('bum): nga'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
190a4('bum): rang byang chub mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos
190a5('bum): thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la
190a6('bum): sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon
190a7('bum): du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la
190a8('bum): sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byab
190b1('bum): la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
190b2('bum): rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
190b3('bum): rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can
190b4('bum): dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su
190b5('bum): 'gro bar zad do// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngos pa rnams
190b6('bum): la yang khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis
190b7('bum): nga'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// 
190b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
191a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs pa dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang
191a2('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ pu dud du bgyi
191a3('bum): mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha
191a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/ gzhan la stsal na de gnyis las gang gi gsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
191a5('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris/ khyod nyid kyis ji lta ra bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de/ 
191a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil sna
191a7('bum): sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ pu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar
191a8('bum): gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te bgo ba shar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po blangs te me tog dang / 
191b1('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ 
191b2('bum): du dung du byas/ mchod par byas na de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
191b3('bum): don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
191b4('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ bu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa bas/ 
191b5('bum): gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
191b6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig te sems can gyi ris
191b7('bum): na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom
191b8('bum): ldan 'das gang la las chung ngun de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar
192a1('bum): mthug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka rigs
192a2('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam byas te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
192a3('bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas bkur stir byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
192a4('bum): phyin pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan byin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams char 'phe la bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
192a5('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung dus nga ste bshad cing bstan pa dang / brjod cing bkrol
192a6('bum): ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo nga ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston
192a7('bum): par yin par bsam mo// bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
192a8('bum): phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang / ston pa/ ston pa nyid
192b1('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
192b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
192b3('bum): brgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de/ de dag kyang shes
192b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par
192b5('bum): 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// koru shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang d+hAn
192b6('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thong gi/ 
192b7('bum): 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nying la bsang
192b8('bum): shing rang byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
193a1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so// 'jug go// 
193a2('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
193a3('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba dang
193a4('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar
193a5('bum): 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dris te/ me tog dang
193a6('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ni bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur stir
193a7('bum): bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ko'u shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
193a8('bum): sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/ gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dung dang / mchod par bya ste/ brten cing rnam par sprad par bya snyam na/ ko'u
193b1('bum): shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / mi dang / lha dang / lham
193b2('bum): yin du bcas pa'i nang na/ nga dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de lta yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba
193b3('bum): bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis/ mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byas te/ rten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o snyam du
193b4('bum): bsams so// ko'u shi ka chos de'ang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
193b5('bum): pa 'di la rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ pu dung du byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod par byas shing
193b6('bum): rnam par spong na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha
193b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan
193b8('bum): sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / pra dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / 
194a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / dreng
194a2('bum): dang / spos dang / byub pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir
194a3('bum): bya ba dang / du dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
194a4('bum): po rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa
194a5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sa byung ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
194a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/ 
194a7('bum): me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro
194a8('bum): bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
194b1('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 
194b2('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong drag
194b3('bum): brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum mo// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la dka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu
194b4('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi la ma la bkod par gyur na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems
194b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // ba
194b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ klag pa 'am/ bri ba 'am/ kha thon tu bya ba'i phyi
194b7('bum): gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi du ma
194b8('bum): slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / 'tho
195a1('bum): par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
195a2('bum): bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
195a3('bum): pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa
195a4('bum): rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs bar gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ra ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
195a5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher
195a6('bum): bstan to// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
195a7('bum): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / nang stong pa
195a8('bum): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'das ma
195b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
195b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
195b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
195b4('bum): ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos te de dag ni shes rab kyi
195b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la slab sa shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
195b6('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka sems can gcig gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
195b7('bum): 'bras bu la bzhag na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni
195b8('bum): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byor song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
196a1('bum): 'jig rten nas yongs su 'grol ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni sems can dmyal ba dang / la
196a2('bum): song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nying la
196a3('bum): bkod pa lta ci smos/ ko'u shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / 
196a4('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dkod pa bas la la zhig gis sems can ga/ cig gis rang byang chub la bzhag na 'di'i bsod nams
196a5('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
196a6('bum): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir
196a7('bum): zhe na/ sems can gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhog pa do ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
196a8('bum): ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi
196b1('bum): kabyang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
196b2('bum): rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang phreng
196b3('bum): ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya
196b4('bum): ba dang / phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las
196b5('bum): kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du se mas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis
196b6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de ngas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
196b7('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glebs bam bri ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes
196b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par
197a1('bum): gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'o
197a2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ 
197a3('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
197a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs pa ra gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par
197a5('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de
197a6('bum): dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
197a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen
197a8('bum): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mthara' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thob ma dang tha ma med
197b1('bum): bstong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa
197b2('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
197b3('bum): ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
197b4('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang
197b5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
197b6('bum): pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bani
197b7('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad
197b8('bum): med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ klag pa dang
198a1('bum): dri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de ni/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes
198a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// 
198a3('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga'
198a4('bum): ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yo da ngo // gzhan 'phrul dbang bye'i lha rnams yod do// tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye pan gyi
198a5('bum): rnams yod ngo do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// 
198a6('bum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge 'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
198a7('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lnga
198a8('bum): rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// namakha' mtha'
198b1('bum): yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched gyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min
198b2('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha
198b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang
198b4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
198b5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// 
198b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos med pa stong pa nyid
198b7('bum): yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// 
198b8('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod
199a1('bum): do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
199a2('bum): rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
199a3('bum): pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs
199a4('bum): pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yo da do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
199a5('bum): yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyi ra mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes
199a6('bum): pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa
199a7('bum): rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
199a8('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs
199b1('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
199b2('bum): lamang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
199b3('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u
199b4('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las za ga pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la ba slabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang dag
199b5('bum): pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// 
199b6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra ba
199b7('bum): pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bya
199b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par
200a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
200a2('bum): bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
200a3('bum): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong
200a4('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 
200a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
200a6('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
200a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / 
200a8('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi
200b1('bum): dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam pa
200b2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
200b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / 
200b4('bum): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tsha da med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u
200b5('bum): ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga nga gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bri sa shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i
200b6('bum): phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams
200b7('bum): cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod
200b8('bum): ngo/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod ngo // 'phrul dga'i lnga
201a1('bum): rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams song ngo // tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye pan gyi lha rnams yod do// 
201a2('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
201a3('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lnga
201a4('bum): rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yo ngango // mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha
201a5('bum): rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
201a6('bum): rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// / 
201a7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha
201a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// 
201b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma
201b2('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// 
201b3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
201b4('bum): yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu' phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod
201b5('bum): ngo/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gta na rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs
201b6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
201b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
201b8('bum): stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jig pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// 
202a1('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongad ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// 
202a2('bum): rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// 
202a3('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs
202a4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam sa yod do// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lnga zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka
202a5('bum): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na
202a6('bum): ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa
202a7('bum): mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba
202a8('bum): dang / kha thon tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med
202b1('bum): pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
202b2('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong
202b3('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis
202b4('bum): rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur
202b5('bum): to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa ra sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
202b6('bum): rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
202b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
202b8('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
203a1('bum): dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
203a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
203a3('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang
203a4('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
203a5('bum): med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 
203a6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
203a7('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa
203a8('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / gtang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgya sa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des
203b1('bum): na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de bas 'di'i bsod nam
203b2('bum): ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal
203b3('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// 
203b4('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
203b5('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
203b6('bum): yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams
203b7('bum): yod ngo // chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// 
203b8('bum): tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// 
204a1('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha'
204a2('bum): yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
204a3('bum): yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// 
204a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po
204a5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// 
204a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
204a7('bum): yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gnag
204a8('bum): pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
204b1('bum): yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i
204b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
204b3('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
204b4('bum): yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yo dngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// 
204b5('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'o/ nga ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub
204b6('bum): yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir
204b7('bum): mi 'ong ba rnams yod ngo do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
204b8('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ 
205a1('bum): / ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung du lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po
205a2('bum): sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
205a3('bum): mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shika
205a4('bum): de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na
205a5('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ 
205a6('bum): de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob
205a7('bum): par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 
205a8('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 
205b1('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na
205b2('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi
205b3('bum): ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
205b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / 
205b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyi da dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
205b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stob pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
205b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye
205b8('bum): bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
206a1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
206a2('bum): pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
206a3('bum): sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / 
206a4('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher
206a5('bum): bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang bri ba dang / 
206a6('bum): kha thon tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
206a7('bum): las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che
206a8('bum): zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams
206b1('bum): yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod ngo // tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'a
206b2('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams
206b3('bum): yod ngo do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i
206b4('bum): lha rnams yong ngo // tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// mi che ba'i lha rna mas yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shinatu
206b5('bum): mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i la rnam sa yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 
206b6('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod ngo // cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i
206b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol
206b8('bum): tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// 
207a1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las
207a2('bum): 'das las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad
207a3('bum): pa nyid yong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo
207a4('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rna mas yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod
207a5('bum): ngo stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnam sa yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// 
207a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom
207a7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams
207a8('bum): yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rigs rnams yod do// snying rje chen
207b1('bum): po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ngo // 
207b2('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig
207b3('bum): phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// 
207b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/ 
207b5('bum): ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha mas kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am ri gas kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu
207b6('bum): bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde ba
207b7('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bri
207b8('bum): ba dang / klag pa dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
208a1('bum): 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya chen bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag pa das pa'i skyon med par zhugs par
208a2('bum): gyur to/ 'dzug 'jug par 'gyur// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras du thob par gyur to/ bro'o/ thob par 'gyur bya 'ong de'i' bras bu thod par gyur to/  sa wang par tsu su tshanang thob par gyur to// 
208a3('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
208a4('bum): rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs ba gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
208a5('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de
208a6('bum): dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
208a7('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
208a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
208b1('bum): dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
208b2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
208b3('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phag
208b4('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
208b5('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 
208b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen
208b7('bum): po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
208b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// 
209a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shika don 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che
209a2('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu
209a3('bum): rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// 
209a4('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yo da do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha
209a5('bum): rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad mang snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung
209a6('bum): dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lnga
209a7('bum): rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang
209a8('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod ngo // namakha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// tsu
209b1('bum): zang med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209b2('bum): yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// / 
209b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
209b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yo da do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba
209b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong
209b6('bum): pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// 
209b7('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 
209b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i
210a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam pa
210a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// 
210a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
210a4('bum): ba bco brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang
210a5('bum): byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba
210a6('bum): rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// 
210a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
210a8('bum): dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu
210b1('bum): 'am rigs kyi du ma de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa pa/ 
210b2('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams
210b3('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs
210b4('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob
210b5('bum): bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur/ ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 
210b6('bum): 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 
210b7('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
210b8('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 
211a1('bum): ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
211a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong
211a3('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
211a4('bum): dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
211a5('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
211a6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par stong pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
211a7('bum): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
211a8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin
211b1('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs cu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
211b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan da
211b3('bum): kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha
211b4('bum): thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de bas 'di'i bsod nam sa ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
211b5('bum): tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te de ngag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod
211b6('bum): // khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod
211b7('bum): do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lnga rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga
211b8('bum): he phan gyi lha rnams yong ngo // tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yong ngo // snang ba'i lha rnams yong // chung snang gi lha rnams yong ngo // 
212a1('bum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// 
212a2('bum): tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
212a3('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnam
212a4('bum): yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes ma tha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad
212a5('bum): med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes me da 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims
212a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
212a7('bum): phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa
212a8('bum): nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong
212b1('bum): pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod
212b2('bum): ngo/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod
212b3('bum): do dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// 
212b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// thar gyis gnas pa'i
212b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting
212b6('bum): nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying
212b7('bum): rje chen po yod ngo do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
212b8('bum): yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod ngo //
