239a7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
239a8('bum): yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa zhid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mo
239b1('bum): do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod
239b2('bum): / stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// 
239b3('bum): tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam
239b4('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yo da do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo
239b5('bum): rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so dado// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang da ga par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// 
239b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa
239b7('bum): nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams
239b8('bum): yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin ga sh+ye
240a1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye
240a2('bum): ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang
240a3('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
240a4('bum): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'a ngas kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
240a5('bum): pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni
240a6('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par
240a7('bum): zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
240a8('bum): gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par
240b1('bum): 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub
240b2('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par
240b3('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
240b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi na ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
240b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyi da dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
240b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong
240b7('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
240b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
241a1('bum): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par
241a2('bum): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug
241a3('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
241a4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad
241a5('bum): med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam gra ngas des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag
241a6('bum): ba dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
241a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs
241a8('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 
241b1('bum): 'drul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha
241b2('bum): rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod
241b3('bum): do/ dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams
241b4('bum): yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lnga
241b5('bum): rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//  ga min gyi lha rnams yod do// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye
241b6('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// // 
241b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang yod// 
241b8('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid
242a1('bum): yod do/ phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid tshang
242a2('bum): do/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid long ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa'i
242a3('bum): yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa
242a4('bum): nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po ma da pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod
242a5('bum): po/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan la ga rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
242a6('bum): brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// 
242a7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// 
242a8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so
242b1('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// 
242b2('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs
242b3('bum): ba rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa'
242b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod ngo do// ko'u shi ka lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
242b5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sem sa can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa
242b6('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
242b7('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas
242b8('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du
243a1('bum): 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka don 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la
243a2('bum): bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob
243a3('bum): bong thob par 'gyuraro lan cig phyir ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra
243a4('bum): bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyuraro// 
243a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag
243a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med
243a7('bum): pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
243a8('bum): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
243b1('bum): panyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma
243b2('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong
243b3('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
243b4('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 
243b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
243b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
243b7('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba
243b8('bum): chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
244a1('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams
244a2('bum): ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs
244a3('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum
244a4('bum): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yo da do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul da ga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
244a5('bum): yod do// tshangs ris kyi lnga rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye ban gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lnga rna mas yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang
244a6('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dgo'i lha
244a7('bum): rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ 
244a8('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og mi
244b1('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do// namakha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes
244b2('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus
244b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang sto
244b4('bum): pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yo da do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas
244b5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
244b6('bum): yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong
244b7('bum): pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod
244b8('bum): do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod
245a1('bum): do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// 
245a2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod ngo // 
245a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// 
245a4('bum): snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir ma 'ong
245a5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yod ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// 
245a6('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang
245a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka nub byang gi phyogs
245a8('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med
245b1('bum): pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
245b2('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas
245b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches
245b4('bum): mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag
245b5('bum): la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ya nga dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'ju ga go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
245b6('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
245b7('bum): bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang
245b8('bum): byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 
246a1('bum): / 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso//  ga bas sum sa la #
246a2('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
246a3('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi
246a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
246a5('bum): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba me dpa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang
246a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
246a7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / 
246a8('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
246b1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin
246b2('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
246b3('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang
246b4('bum): rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / 
246b5('bum): bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes pa ra bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
246b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// 
246b7('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// 
246b8('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye phan gyi
247a1('bum): lha rnams yod ngo do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi
247a2('bum): lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lnga
247a3('bum): rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
247a4('bum): mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod
247a5('bum): do na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du
247a6('bum): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// 
247a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// 
247a8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa
247b1('bum): nyid yod do// mtha' 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams ca
247b2('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med
247b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// 
247b4('bum): stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod ngo // bsam
247b5('bum): gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas
247b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting
247b7('bum): nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
247b8('bum): yod ngo do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir
248a1('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yong ngo // rnam pa thams
248a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs
248a3('bum): rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi
248a4('bum): ka 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gang
248a5('bum): bzhi la dkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 
248a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
248a7('bum): stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ 
248a8('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bas
248b1('bum): shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// 
248b2('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra
248b3('bum): bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
248b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
248b5('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i
248b6('bum): chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi nga
248b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong
248b8('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
249a1('bum): nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang
249a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
249a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par bong pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 
249a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phag sa pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
249a5('bum): dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mdo na par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / 
249a6('bum): gzungs kyi thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
249a7('bum): bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang
249a8('bum): rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / 
249b1('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko ru shi ka de ni 'di ltar she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
249b2('bum): chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho
249b3('bum): ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 
249b4('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang bye dkyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa
249b5('bum): kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rna mas yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung sna nga gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod
249b6('bum): donakun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// 
249b7('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// me gdung ba'i lha rnams
249b8('bum): yod ngo do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// rnam kha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lnga rnams yod do// 
250a1('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mtshod kyi
250a2('bum): lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// 
250a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
250a4('bum): yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyidad yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod / 
250a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid
250a6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa
250a7('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag lnga spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 
250a8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod ngo do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// chang med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
250b1('bum): pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyang yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
250b2('bum): yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// 
250b3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod ngo do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'dras
250b4('bum): bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams
250b5('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// byod mi 'ong ba rnams sa dodagra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams
250b6('bum): yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka
250b7('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de// tshad med
250b8('bum): pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ngang
251a1('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
251a2('bum): pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams
251a3('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi
251a4('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs bar gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob
251a5('bum): par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob
251a6('bum): bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 
251a7('bum): 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur te// 'jug go// 'jug par
251a8('bum): 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
251b1('bum): 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
251b2('bum): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang
251b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / 
251b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyi nga dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
251b5('bum): cang stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
251b6('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs la dang
251b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
251b8('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / 
252a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
252a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa
252a3('bum): gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / dri ba dang / 
252a4('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de bas 'di'i bsod nam sa ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
252a5('bum): phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ ded g.yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// 
252a6('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga'
252a7('bum): ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye pan gyi lha rnams
252a8('bum): yod ngo do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lnga
252b1('bum): rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// 
252b2('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams
252b3('bum): yang ngo // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// namakha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod ngo // rnam
252b4('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du she sa med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 
252b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi nga la tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ngango // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// 
252b6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa
252b7('bum): yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do
252b8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
253a1('bum): yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
253a2('bum): nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang
253a3('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// 
253a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar
253a5('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon ba med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// / ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
253a6('bum): yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
253a7('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// 
253a8('bum): rang byang chub me nga // lam thonam pa shes pa nyid med do// rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'dang // lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams mang/ 
253b1('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa
253b2('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// 
253b3('bum): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
253b4('bum): chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ ngo'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu 'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
253b5('bum): la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni
253b6('bum): ma yin no// gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang
253b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa ni ma yin no// stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las
253b8('bum): kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// 
254a1('bum): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkong ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
254a2('bum): med pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
254a3('bum): can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa
254a4('bum): lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// de la tshul bzhin yi de la byed pa ni 'di yin te/ gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos shes
254a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par bye/ da pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhi na du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi
254a6('bum): gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed
254a7('bum): pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 
254a8('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 
254b1('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
254b2('bum): 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
254b3('bum): blos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ 
254b4('bum): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ ba'i blos/ nang stong pa nyid 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa/  nga / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du li
254b5('bum): la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mig nyes pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos phyi stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'i
254b6('bum): ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin
254b7('bum): nga'i blos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos chen po stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid
254b8('bum): la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi
255a1('bum): gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa spyod
255a2('bum): pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mtha' las 'das pa
255a3('bum): stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// 
255a4('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ 
255a5('bum): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rang bzhi na stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma
255a6('bum): yin pa'i blos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i bros/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
255a7('bum): pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// 
255a8('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod ba'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la
255b1('bum): spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis par spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
255b2('bum): stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// 
255b3('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin ma gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ yang dag par spong ba rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa
255b4('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rna mas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyo da pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
255b5('bum): blos/ dbang po rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid
255b6('bum): la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma
255b7('bum): yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spod pa'ang ma yin// mi gnyis pa la spyod pa
255b8('bum): 'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ bsam gtan
256a1('bum): rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ tshad med pa rnams tshul
256a2('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed
256a3('bum): pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rnam par thar pa brgyad tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi
256a4('bum): gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis
256a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// 
256a6('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mngon par shes pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa
256a7('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ ting nge 'dzin rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
256a8('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// 
256b1('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mi 'jigs pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod
256b2('bum): pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ snying rje chen po
256b3('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// 
256b4('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'i nga ma yin pa blos/ thams cad shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ 
256b5('bum): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ lam gyi rna ma pa shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa 'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod
256b6('bum): pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
256b7('bum): pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du mar rgya cher brjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston cing / de'i don gtan la bab par ston pa
256b8('bum): byed na/ ko'u shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su blta ba ma yin/ gnyis su med par blta ba ma yin/ mtshan
257a1('bum): mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/ blang bar ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ dadri bar ma yin/ bsnan par ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par ma
257a2('bum): yin/ rnam par byang bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ 'gag par ma yin/ gzung bar ma yin/ mi gzung bar ma yin/ len par ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ gnas par ma yin mi
257a3('bum): mi gnas par mi yin/ yang dag par ma yin/ log par ma yin/ ldan par ma yin/ mi ldan par ma yin/ 'dre bar ma yin mi 'dre bar ma yin/ rkyen tu ma yin/ rkyen med
257a4('bum): par ma yin/ chos su ma yin chos ma yin par ma yin/ de bzhin nyid du ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin yang dag pa'i
257a5('bum): mthar ma yin par ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher brjod cing ston la/ 'chad cing 'brel pa dang / 
257a6('bum): rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/ yang dag par ston par byed cing / de'i don gtan la bab par byed na/ bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gis bzung
257a7('bum): ba 'am kun chub par byas pa 'am/ bcang ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni ma yin no// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
257a8('bum): bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de 'chang zhing klog la tshul bzhin du yid la byed de/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher rjod cing ston la/ 'chad cing 'brel pa
257b1('bum): dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston par byed cing de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams shin tu
257b2('bum): mang du 'phel lo// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par
257b3('bum): bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya ste/ 
257b4('bum): ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am
257b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me
257b6('bum): tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang bde ba'i yo byad
257b7('bum): thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / pu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab
257b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mas brjod de bstan pa dang bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par
258a1('bum): bstan par byas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
258a2('bum): 'di la bslabs te 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
258a3('bum): nga'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
258a4('bum): mo la las lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba
258a5('bum): dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' da nga / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
258a6('bum): kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol
258a7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan
258a8('bum): ba byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni chos mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / 
258b1('bum): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
258b2('bum): par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las nub phyogs
258b3('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / 
258b4('bum): bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal ma tshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang
258b5('bum): bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dung du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
258b6('bum): pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan
258b7('bum): bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa
258b8('bum): dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
259a1('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs
259a2('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / 
259a3('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
259a4('bum): kyis/ rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gi
259a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bsta na pa dang / bshad de dkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal
259a6('bum): ba dang / yang dag par bstan par byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni chos mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
259a7('bum): la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par
259a8('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
259b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du/ me
259b2('bum): tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad
259b3('bum): thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / pu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes
259b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan mi ge nga ldan pa la du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bsha da de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang
259b5('bum): dag par bstan par byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
259b6('bum): la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang
259b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal
259b8('bum): de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chang med grangs med pa dag la nam
260a1('bum): 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan dang / 
260a2('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / pu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs
260a3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de
260a4('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// 
260a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da lta ra byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
260a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
260a7('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
260a8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / 
260b1('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / 
260b2('bum): mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam
260b3('bum): grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan par byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
260b4('bum): bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bslabs te// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de
260b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
260b6('bum): sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las nub byang gi
260b7('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / 
260b8('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis/ rim gror byas pa
261a1('bum): dang / bkur bstir byas pa dang / phu dung du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
261a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba
261a3('bum): dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
261a4('bum): la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ 
261a5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzog sa par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
261a6('bum): 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs
261a7('bum): med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
261a8('bum): snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu
261b1('bum): tham rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam
261b2('bum): par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha
261b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na
261b4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi
261b5('bum): ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa
261b6('bum): dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna
261b7('bum): tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dung du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rig
261b8('bum): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ 
262a1('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan par byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i
262a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
262a3('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs
262a4('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin
262a5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa cha da med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal
262a6('bum): pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus
262a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs
262a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas ni/ gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gcan la rgya cher brjod
262b1('bum): cing ston la/ 'chad cing rnam par 'god pa dang / rab tu 'god cing rnam par 'byed la gsal ba byed cing yang dag pa ston pa byed na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de la dmigs pa
262b2('bum): ni 'di yin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa gtong zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa gtong ngo // sbyin pa ni 'di gtong // 'di la ni sbyin par bya'o snyam
262b3('bum): na nges sbyin pa de ltar btang bas sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims srung zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni tshul khrims srung
262b4('bum): ngo tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam na/ nges tshul khri mas de ltar bsrungs pas tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// dmigs
262b5('bum): nga'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgom zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni bzod pa bsgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam na/ des bzod pa de ltar bsgoms pas/ bzod pa nyid
262b6('bum): du 'gyur gyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus rtsom zhing 'di snyam du bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// 'di'i don du brtson 'grus
262b7('bum): brtsom mo snyam na nges brtson 'grus de ltar brtsams pas brtson 'grus nyid du 'gyur gyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams
262b8('bum): la snyoms par 'jug cing 'di snyam du bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la mnyam par gzhag go snyam na nges bsam gtan la de ltar
263a1('bum): mnyam par gzhag pas bsam gtan nyid du 'gyur gyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab bsgom zhing
263a2('bum): 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/ shes rab ni 'di sgom mo snyam na nges shes rab de ltar bsgoms pas shes rab nyid du 'gyur gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ko'u
263a3('bum): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar dmigs pa la spyod pas ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
263a4('bum): rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pa rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// bsam
263a5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyu ro// shes sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'a
263a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad
263a7('bum): na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
263a8('bum): bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
263b1('bum): dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha
263b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ yongs
263b3('bum): su gtong ba mi dmigs sbyin pa dang len pa mi dmigs so// tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/ tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba mi dmigs so// bzod pa sgom pa'i
263b4('bum): tshe bzod pa dang / bzod pa bsgom pa mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi dmigs so// bsam gtan
263b5('bum): rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan dang bsam gtan bsgom pa mi dmigs so// shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ shes rab dang shes rab sgom
263b6('bum): pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
263b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzog
263b8('bum): par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am
264a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de ltar khong du chud pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o// de ltar khong du chud
264a2('bum): pa med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o// de ltar khong du chud pa med par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan yi
264a3('bum): ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o// de ltar khong du chud pa med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o// de ltar khong du chud pa med par
264a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan yi ge dang lnga na bar bstan par bya'o// de ltar khong du chud pa med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan yi ge dang
264a5('bum): ldan par bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
264a6('bum): pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa 'byung ste/ der rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs
264a7('bum): pa de dag gis kyang gzugs brnyan de thos nas/ lam ston par 'gyur te/ de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o// 
264a8('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di la
264b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to snyam zhing de dag gzugs brnyan ston par byed pa'o// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ ji ltar na rigs kyi bu
264b2('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am
264b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa byed pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// de la 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
264b4('bum): gzugs brnyan te/ 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba ra ston/ gzugs bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ 
264b5('bum): gzugs mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa
264b6('bum): de dag kyang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
264b7('bum): gzugs mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag gzugs mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs
264b8('bum): bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// tshor ba mi
265a1('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing
265a2('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshor ba sdug bsngal
265a3('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshor ba mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
265a4('bum): tshor ba sdul bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba mi sdug go/ zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
265a5('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo/ zhes bya bar ston/ 'du shes bdag med do zhes bya bar
265a6('bum): ston/ 'du shes mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang 'du
265a7('bum): shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du shes mi sdug ces
265a8('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du shes bdag med ngo zhes bya bar/ 
265b1('bum): rtog pa dang / 'du shes mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'du
265b2('bum): byad mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ 'du byed bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ 'du byed mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di
265b3('bum): skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du byed
265b4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du byed mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar
265b5('bum): de dag 'du byed mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du byed bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du byed
265b6('bum): mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes
265b7('bum): pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ 
265b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes
266a1('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
266a2('bum): de ltar de dag rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa bdag meng ngo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
266a3('bum): rnam par shes pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mig mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mig sdug bsngal lo
