302b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// go'u shi ka ga zhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
302b6('bum): bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom shig/ rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum
302b7('bum): lnga shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
302b8('bum): pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rna ba rtag ces bya bar 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la rna ba nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
303a1('bum): sten// kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
303a2('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyed kyis
303a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sna mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna ni rang bzhon gyis stong ste/ sna'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos
303a4('bum): po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba gang yin pa de la ni/ sna rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi
303a5('bum): rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la sna nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
303a6('bum): de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyar mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs
303a7('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar sten te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po sgoms shig/ lce mi rtag ces bya bar
303a8('bum): yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lce'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes
303b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lce rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la lce nyid kyang medan rtag pa'am/ mi rtag
303b2('bum): blta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan snga
303b3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu
303b4('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms shig/ lus mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjesu ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhon/ lus ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus
303b5('bum): kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po meng pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de
303b6('bum): la ni/ lus rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces byab mi dmig so// de la lus nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston de/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi
303b7('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
303b8('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ yid mi rtag
304a1('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa
304a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ yid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la yid nyid kyang med
304a3('bum): na rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// / 
304a4('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
304a5('bum): 'di ltar ston te/ nur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ 
304a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
304a7('bum): phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la gzugs nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa
304a8('bum): 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston to// kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ gos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// 
304b1('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
304b2('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom shig/ sgra mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sgra'i rang bzhi/ 
304b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am
304b4('bum): mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la sgra nyid kyang med naHga pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
304b5('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzu gas brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rig sa kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
304b6('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
304b7('bum): shig/ dri mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dri'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang
304b8('bum): yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dri rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigaso// de la dri nyid kyang
305a1('bum): med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
305a2('bum): gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
305a3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ ro mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
305a4('bum): ro ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ro'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab
305a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ro rtag/ ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la ro nyid kyang med na rtag pa'ang mi rtag pa lta ba la yod ces
305a6('bum): ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
305a7('bum): mo de dag bang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
305a8('bum): bsgoms shig/ reg mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ reg gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// 
305b1('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ reg rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de
305b2('bum): la reg nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
305b3('bum): brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
305b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ cho sa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ 
305b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chos kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po mang pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha
305b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chos rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la chos nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am
305b7('bum): mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau sha kau de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// 
305b8('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang // rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
306a1('bum): 'di ltar sten te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum
306a2('bum): lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po mang ba gang yin pa de
306a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs// de la mig gi rnam par
306a4('bum): shes pa nyid kyang me na// rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces byastod te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rig sa kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha
306a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs par na mi sten to// kau shi ka ga/ zhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang dub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi du
306a6('bum): de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston to// tshur rigs kyi bu khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms shig/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mi rtag ces bya bar yang
306a7('bum): dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po mang po'o// dngos po med pa gang
306a8('bum): min / shes pa kyi lal tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pa mdu phyin pa gang yin pa de yini/ na ba'i rnam pa shes padag ces byab 'am/ mirtag ces bya ba mi darig go/ de la
306b1('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lnga ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
306b2('bum): brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mer dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
306b3('bum): ltar sten te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma ldang shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i rnam par
306b4('bum): shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 
306b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni sA 'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba ni dmigs so// de la sna'i rnam par shes pa
306b6('bum): nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar sten pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
306b7('bum): mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
306b8('bum): ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lha'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjesu ma lta shig/ de ci'i por zhen la
307a1('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha ro
307a2('bum): tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
307a3('bum): na rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brlan re sten to// 
307a4('bum): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bya/ nga chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
307a5('bum): lngar ston to// tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol// tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lus kyi rnam par she/ sa pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ 
307a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po meng ba gang yin pa de ni shes
307a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la lus kyi rnam par shes
307a8('bum): pa nyid kyang me na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs pacar/ 
307b1('bum): mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i ris kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ 
307b2('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes
307b3('bum): pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes
307b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ce sa bya ba mi dmigs so// de la yid kyi rnam par
307b5('bum): shes pa nyid kyang meng na rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar s+ho/ na pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ 
307b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sams dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
307b7('bum): shu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mig gi 'dus
307b8('bum): te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
308a1('bum): dngos po med pa'o// dngos po mang ba gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni
308a2('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga
308a3('bum): la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar sten pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang
308a4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sem sar pa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ 
308a5('bum): chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjesu ma lta shig/ de ci'i
308a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni
308a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// 
308a8('bum): de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa ltag la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ 
308b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ 
308b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skems shig/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag
308b3('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
308b4('bum): dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna'i
308b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la snga'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
308b6('bum): ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
308b7('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
308b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong
309a1('bum): sde/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po mang ba'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa deni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa
309a2('bum): de la ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am// mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lnga ga la
309a3('bum): yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs par na mi ston do// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
309a4('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sem sad pa'i thed pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang ga la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur
309a5('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci
309a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni// dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin
309a7('bum): ba de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi
309a8('bum): dmigaso// de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
309b1('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
309b2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu mkhyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 
309b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin
309b4('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
309b5('bum): de la ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigaso// de la yid kyi 'du sa te reg pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga
309b6('bum): la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
309b7('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu
309b8('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi
310a1('bum): / 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po mang pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin
310a2('bum): pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mig gi 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigaso// 
310a3('bum): de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes
310a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
310a5('bum): bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol te phyin pa sgoms shig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
310a6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
310a7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
310a8('bum): de la ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'id kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag
310b1('bum): pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo da dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
310b2('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
310b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
310b4('bum): gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te re ga bi'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po meng po'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni sdem
310b5('bum): myed pa shes kyi ro tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la sdi'i 'dus
310b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab
310b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
310b8('bum): mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ rkur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
311a1('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i
311a2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po mang ba'o// dngos po meng pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de
311a3('bum): la ri/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis dor ba nyid kyang yang // rtag pa
311a4('bum): 'am mi rtag pa ldag la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brlan ri
311a5('bum): ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rig sa kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha
311a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag
311a7('bum): par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa
311a8('bum): de ni dngos po meng pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
311b1('bum): gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag palta ga la yod ces ston te/ 
311b2('bum): kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
311b3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
311b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba mi rtag ces bya bar ya bdag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
311b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin rgya sa stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med
311b6('bum): pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
311b7('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag palta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau
311b8('bum): shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdong
312a1('bum): phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyas gsum pa/ kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu bo dag byang chub sems dpa'i
312a2('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 
312a3('bum): sir khams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni// dngos po
312a4('bum): med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na ba gang yin pa de la ni/ sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba
312a5('bum): 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la si khams nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la mo de ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu
312a6('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
312a7('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ chu'i
312a8('bum): khams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// / 
312b1('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba
312b2('bum): mi dmigaso// de la chu'i khams nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ 
312b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
312b4('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ste/ na te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ me'i khams mi rtag ces bya
312b5('bum): bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ me'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ me'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos
312b6('bum): po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni// me'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs
312b7('bum): so// de la me'i khams nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston to// kau sha ka de ltar sten pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
312b8('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ 
313a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston// tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag
313a2('bum): par rjesu ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rlung gi khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po meng pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni
313a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rlung gi khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigaso// de la rlung gi khams
313a4('bum): nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
313a5('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gan/ na yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
313a6('bum): bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ nam mkha'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar
313a7('bum): yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po
313a8('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni// nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba
313b1('bum): mi dmigs so// de la namakha'i khams nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston// kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
313b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
313b3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag
313b4('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shog/ de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin
313b5('bum): bden// dngos po mang po'o// dngos po mang ba gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa ro la ni/ rnam par shes pa'i
313b6('bum): khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la rnam par shes pa'i khyams nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka
313b7('bum): de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
313b8('bum): mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khrod kyis shes rab kyi
314a1('bum): pha rol du phyin pasgom shig/ ma rig pa mi rtag cesu ba bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ma rig pa'i rang rin/ 
314a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ma rig pa rtag ces byab
314a3('bum): 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la ma rig pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma
314a4('bum): de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs pa rnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
314a5('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig
314a6('bum): 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med
314a7('bum): pa'o// dngos po meng ba gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba
314a8('bum): mi dmigs so// de la 'du byed nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes ra
314b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
314b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ 
314b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi
314b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigaso// de la rnam
314b5('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am/ mi rtag palta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
314b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
314b7('bum): rigs kyi bu me de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ ming dang gzugs mi rtag
314b8('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming dang gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/ 
315a1('bum): / dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ming dang gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ 
315a2('bum): mi rtag ces bya ba mir mig so// de la ming dang gzugs nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
315a3('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
315a4('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ skye mched drug mi rtag ces
315a5('bum): bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye mched drug ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos
315a6('bum): po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ skye mched drug rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la
315a7('bum): skye mched drug nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
315a8('bum): gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
315b1('bum): pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg pa ni rang bani
315b2('bum): gyis stong ste/ reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 
315b3('bum): reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la reg pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
315b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo ri dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
315b5('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rig pa kyi bu dang / ri gas kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
315b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin
315b7('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni// tshor brtag ces bya ba 'am/ 
315b8('bum): mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la tshor ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
316a1('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs parnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi dru dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems pa'i theg pa pa'i
316a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar sten te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sred pa mi rtag ces bya bar
316a3('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sred pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sred pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
316a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ srad ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la
316a5('bum): sred pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag palta ba la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes
316a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi sten to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs
316a7('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ len pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par
316a8('bum): rjesu ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ len pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ len pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pade ni dngos po mang po'o// dngos po meng pa gang yin pa de ni/ she so rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
316b1('bum): pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni// len pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs// de la len pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod
316b2('bum): ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi
316b3('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
316b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ srid pa mirtagaces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lnga shig/ de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ srid pa rnying bzhin gyis stong ste/ srid pa
316b5('bum): rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po mang pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni
316b6('bum): srid brtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la srid pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
316b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thag pa
316b8('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ skye ba me rtag
317a1('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ skye ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos
317a2('bum): po mang ba gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ skye ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de
317a3('bum): la skye ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag paltag la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i gzug
317a4('bum): brnyar mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
317a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rga shi mi dge bya bar yang dag par
317a6('bum): rjesu ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rga shi'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pa
317a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rga shi rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la rga shi nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa
317a8('bum): lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brtan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rig
317b1('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
317b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis
317b3('bum): stong ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po mang pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
317b4('bum): tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang
317b5('bum): meng na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston / kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
317b6('bum): gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mi de dag la shes
317b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar
317b8('bum): yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa den
318a1('bum): dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
318a2('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi
318a3('bum): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
318a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar/ ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces
318a5('bum): bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bza dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med
318a6('bum): pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya
318a7('bum): ba mi dmig so// de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te// kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab
318a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sa de'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
318b1('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir
318b2('bum): zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po meng pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi
318b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigaso// de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
318b4('bum): tu phyin pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am ma rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar smon pa'i rig sa kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha
318b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / 
318b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
318b7('bum): pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
318b8('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni// bsam gtan gyi pha
319a1('bum): ro tu phyin pa cag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa cing kyang medan// mapa' ma mi dag bldag
319a2('bum): yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi stod to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
319a3('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod
319a4('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha
319a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po ma dpe'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes ra
319a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// ral shes
319a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
319a8('bum): tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
319b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lnga
319b2('bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
319b3('bum): tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la nang stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am
319b4('bum): mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// 
319b5('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu ma de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
319b6('bum): byin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir
319b7('bum): zhe na/ phyi stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
319b8('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la phyi stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am
320a1('bum): / mi rtag pa lcag la yod ces ston// ko shi ka ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi du'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs parnan
320a2('bum): mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu rang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i
320a3('bum): ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyinang stong
320a4('bum): pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// rngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
320a5('bum): phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dal ni phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang med
320a6('bum): na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mo ston
320a7('bum): to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
320a8('bum): 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
320b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
320b2('bum): phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kya
320b3('bum): meng na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
320b4('bum): brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang dub sems dang 'itheg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
320b5('bum): dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol// tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces
320b6('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shog/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chen po stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/ 
320b7('bum): dngos po mang ba gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces
320b8('bum): bya ba mi dmig so// de la chen po stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/ 
321a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
321a2('bum): rang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces byab
321a3('bum): yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po
321a4('bum): med pa gang yin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag
321a5('bum): ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu
321a6('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'
321a7('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 
321a8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir na na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang ba
321b1('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni// 'dus byas stong pa
321b2('bum): nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigaso// de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i
321b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub se
321b4('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
321b5('bum): sgoms shig/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rdzo sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 
321b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
321b7('bum): gang yin pa de la ni/ 'dus ma pas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa
321b8('bum): lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka
322a1('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo ngag byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar sngon te/ 
322a2('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ mtha'
322a3('bum): las 'ongs pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med po gang yin pa de ni
322a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi
322a5('bum): dmig so// de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
322a6('bum): mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
322a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyi
322a8('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma ga shog/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
322b1('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni// thog mang
322b2('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ 
322b3('bum): kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
322b4('bum): kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu
322b5('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su mi lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dor ba
322b6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
322b7('bum): tu byin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
322b8('bum): kyang med na/ rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ma
323a1('bum): ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu po de dag la shes rab
323a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma la
323a3('bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang
323a4('bum): yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces
323a5('bum): bya ba mi dmigs so// de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston / kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
323a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang // rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
323a7('bum): nga'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ chos thang snyo
323a8('bum): pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chos thams cid myong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin
323b1('bum): dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ 
323b2('bum): mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
323b3('bum): bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
323b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi
323b5('bum): rtag ces bye bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhi
323b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni// dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid
323b7('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar
323b8('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
324a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab
324a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong
324a3('bum): ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med po gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes ra
324a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mi dbigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang med na// rtag pa
324a5('bum): 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston
324a6('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
324a7('bum): ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dngos po med pa stong po nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir na
324a8('bum): ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid na rang bzhin gyis stong ste// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos pa med pa'o// ngom pa med pa gang yin pa don/ shes co rje
324b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la dngos po med pa stong pa
324b2('bum): pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
324b3('bum): brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
324b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston to// tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum la
324b5('bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhi na gyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa
324b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi
324b7('bum): dmigaso// de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag blta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shos rab kyi
324b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
325a1('bum): de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stob pa
325a2('bum): nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
325a3('bum): rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med po gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dngos po
325a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la dngos po med pa'i ngo sa nyid stong pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa
325a5('bum): ltag la yod ces ston te/ kau sha~M ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brtan mi ston to/ 
325a6('bum): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston
325a7('bum): te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
325a8('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de// shes
325b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigaso// de la dran pa
325b2('bum): bar gzhag pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
325b3('bum): du phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
325b4('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bsgoms shig/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag
325b5('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin
325b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni// yang dag par spyod pa
325b7('bum): rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigaso// de la yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta go la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston
325b8('bum): ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
326a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar smon te/ tshur rigs kyi chu khyod kyis shes
326a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 
326a3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la
326a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rta ga ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ 
326a5('bum): shi ka da ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'amo/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzug sa brnyan mi ston to// kau shri ka gzhan yang rigs
326a6('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu
326a7('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 
326a8('bum): dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la
326b1('bum): ni/ dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la dbang po rnams nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar
326b2('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
326b3('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 
326b4('bum): stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su sa lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin
326b5('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ stobs
326b6('bum): rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la stobs nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i
326b7('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub
326b8('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
327a1('bum): / sgoms shig/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rang bzhin gyis skye
327a2('bum): sde/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin
327a3('bum): bde la ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston
327a4('bum): kau shi ki de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs baR+Sha ni ma ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / 
327a5('bum): rigs kyi bu me de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i thegs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi
327a6('bum): bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su mo lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags
327a7('bum): nga'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po meng ba gang yin pa
327a8('bum): de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin de la ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces
327b1('bum): dbya ba mi dmig so// de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
327b2('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
327b3('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
327b4('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ra
327b5('bum): bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
327b6('bum): de la ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la
327b7('bum): yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
327b8('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag lo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu
328a1('bum): bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen
328a2('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
328a3('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni// bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la bsam gtan nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am/ mi
328a4('bum): rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar sto/ na ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// koT
328a5('bum): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / ga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bud nga/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
328a6('bum): pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
328a7('bum): tshad med pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
328a8('bum): / gapal kyi rol phyin pa gang yin padag tshad med pa rnams ta/ ces bya ba lags tag ces byab mi migs// de 'tshad med pa nyid kyang bangan/ rtag pa 'ag sa
328b1('bum): blta ga la yod ces ston// kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang
328b2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ rkur rigs kyi bu
328b3('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs
