328b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis steng ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po
328b5('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag
328b6('bum): ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka
328b7('bum): de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
328b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi
329a1('bum): bsgoms shig/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis
329a2('bum): stong ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dnges po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la
329a3('bum): ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la rnam par thar pa rnams nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston
329a4('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka ga zhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
329a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rig sa kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi
329a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
329a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni
329a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// / 
329b1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
329b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// ba pa brgyas ba'i pa
329b3('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
329b4('bum): ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
329b5('bum): med pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rang
329b6('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mo med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin
329b7('bum): de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces
329b8('bum): bya ba 'am// jirtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'ang mi rtag pa lta ga la yod
330a1('bum): ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs bar na mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan
330a2('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
330a3('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma ltar shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par
330a4('bum): shes pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mngon par she sa pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha
330a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mngon par shes pa rnam sa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// 
330a6('bum): de la mngon par shes pa nyid kyang med na/ rtog pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
330a7('bum): tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
330a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ nur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ ting 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig
330b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting 'dzin rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha
330b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ting 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba'agami rtag ce bya 'i rig ko/ de la ting 'dzin nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa
330b3('bum): lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang
330b4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems ra ba'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ 
330b5('bum): chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bsgoms shig/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ce sa bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen
330b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
330b7('bum): phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang med na/ 
330b8('bum): rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston/ 
331a1('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang ka rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinam
331a2('bum): 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ deci'i phyir na
331a3('bum): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
331a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi
331a5('bum): dmig so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi du
331a6('bum): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / 
331a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces
331a8('bum): bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ni ring bzhin gyis stong ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po
331b1('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// 
331b2('bum): de la mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
331b3('bum): gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me re dag la shes rab kyi
331b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par
331b5('bum): rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir she na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po
331b6('bum): med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ 
331b7('bum): mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtog pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
331b8('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
332a1('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sri
332a2('bum): chen po mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po mang pa'o// 
332a3('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba
332a4('bum): dmig so// de la snying rje chen po nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa lta gal yod ces ston te/ ko shi ka de ltar ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi du
332a5('bum): de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston te/ ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
332a6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol / tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sangs rgyas kyi
332a7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
332a8('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
332b1('bum): de la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang mang na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa
332b2('bum): lha ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rig
332b3('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dadag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston to// tshur rigs kyi bu
332b4('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyun du zhugs
332b5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rgyun tu zhung / sa pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po ma dnga'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab
332b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la rgyun du zhugs
332b7('bum): pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
332b8('bum): gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha
333a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar
333a2('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po
333a3('bum): med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba 'am
333a4('bum): mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang medan/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa ltag la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i
333a5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
333a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
333a7('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lnga shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras buni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ phyir me'
333a8('bum): 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po meng pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa don/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ phyir mi 'ong
333b1('bum): 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga lta yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi
333b2('bum): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa' thag pa pa'i
333b3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag
333b4('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po mang po'o// 
333b5('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin bde la ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ 
333b6('bum): mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigaso// de la dgra bcom pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
333b7('bum): bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i chos
333b8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rang byang chub mi rtag ces bya bar
334a1('bum): yang dag par rje sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang byang dub ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po meng pa'o// da
334a2('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rang bang chub rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces byab mi dmig so// de la
334a3('bum): rang byang chub nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
334a4('bum): brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang // rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi
334a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang
334a6('bum): dag par rje su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// 
334a7('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi
334a8('bum): rtag ces bya ba mi dmig so// de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka da ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
334b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brtan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
334b2('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam pa thams cad
334b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje su ma lta shog/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
334b4('bum): kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa la
334b5('bum): ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med/ rtag pa
334b6('bum): 'am mi rtag palta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// 
334b7('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
334b8('bum): 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ chos gang las kyang yongasu 'da' bar ma byed cig/ chos gang la yang
335a1('bum): gnas par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ chos gang las 'da' bar bya ba 'am gang la gnas par
335a2('bum): bya ba'i chos de lta bu mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni dngos po
335a3('bum): blang ba'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ blang bar bya ba 'am/ dor bar bab 'a
335a4('bum): skyed par bya ba'am/ 'gag par byas pa'i chos gang ya nga med do zhes ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston po'i rig sa kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dgani shes rab kyi pha
335a5('bum): la tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka/ de bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de lta ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan par bya ste/ 
335a6('bum): kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag ni ma yin no// 
335a7('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji srid pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkodan
335a8('bum): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
335b1('bum): mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shri ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'didon dang ldan yi ge nga
335b2('bum): ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / shad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan par byas dang / 'od skad du dur rigs kyi bu khyod
335b3('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
335b4('bum): tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shog ces bsgon// ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nga las rgyun tu zhugs pa
335b5('bum): rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang la la lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed
335b6('bum): pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
335b7('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdo// bde bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang
335b8('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan pa dang ldan pa gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ 
336a1('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis
336a2('bum): shig/ chongs shig/ lcogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bsten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du myos shig ces bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nam
336a3('bum): mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
336a4('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa lta zhig gi/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
336a5('bum): la zhig gis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu brko/ dan/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
336a6('bum): lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma // bde bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ 
336a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bya ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan
336a8('bum): pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis
336b1('bum): shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgon// ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol
336b2('bum): du phyin pa 'di las/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can/ rgyun tu zhugaso pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog go/ 
336b3('bum): shi ka stong gnyis kyi'i jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka
336b4('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gso la pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdo// bde bar gshegs pa
336b5('bum): mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dadon dang
336b6('bum): ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi
336b7('bum): bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
336b8('bum): tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phe lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par
337a1('bum): 'gyuraro// kau shi ka sdong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po
337a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems
337a3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdo// bde bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
337a4('bum): kau shi ka debs kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi sa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / 
337a5('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / ya nga dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
337a6('bum): zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis
337a7('bum): shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod
337a8('bum): par 'gyuraro// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka phyogs
337b1('bum): bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
337b2('bum): bul rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // 
337b3('bum): bde bar gshegs pa ma // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
337b4('bum): pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjo da de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam pa ra pya ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan
337b5('bum): byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub pa r-i gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig
337b6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'ab lo// de ci
337b7('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa
337b8('bum): de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
338a1('bum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
338a2('bum): pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yige dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad pa
338a3('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du nur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun nub pa
338a4('bum): gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul ba zhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces

338a7('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo

338b7('bum): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma // bde bar gshegs pa ma // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
338b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang /

339a2('bum): lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na// ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'ba'o// de ci'i

339a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal

339b4('bum): lon cig phyir ring ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shika de'i snyam du sams/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bum de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du'asas

339b7('bum): ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstun pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig

340a2('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma skad

340a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang

340b4('bum): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bya ste/ gas la ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 2di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu

340b7('bum): yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka glang chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
340b8('bum): sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu la
341a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdo// bde bar gshegs pa ma // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
341a2('bum): stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad
341a3('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa bas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig
341a4('bum): chongs shig/ lhogaso shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams
341a5('bum): mang du 'phel lo//  ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyuraro// kau shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten
341a6('bum): gyi khams kyi sems can/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ skyong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma
341a7('bum): la la zhig gis/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel laM
341a8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
341b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa
341b2('bum): byas pa dang / 'di skad du dur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pazung shig/ kun ba par gyis shig/ tshangs shig/ lcags shig/ rdul bzhin du yid la gyis
341b3('bum): shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan ta du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phelo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi
341b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las par mi 'ong ba rnams yod bar 'gyuraro// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi kham sa byur bu'i sems can/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
341b5('bum): la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
341b6('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa/ 
341b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ma // bde bar gshegs pa ma // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
341b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan
342a1('bum): pabyas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pazung shig/ kun nub par gyis shig/ chos shig/ rdzogs shig// dus
342a2('bum): bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir she na/ kau sheg shes
342a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod
342a4('bum): palta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha mas kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
342a5('bum): 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nam sa de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom
342a6('bum): ldan 'das mdo// bang bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha
342a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang // yang dag par bstan pa
342a8('bum): byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ tshongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig
342b1('bum): ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin sa nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
342b2('bum): ba 'di las pir mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lnga zhog gi
342b3('bum): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ phyir mi
342b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau sha ki de ji snya ma du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa

347a7('bum): yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ tshangs shig/ lcogs shig chul
347a8('bum): bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phelo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
347b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rang byang chub la
347b2('bum): bkod pa lta zhog gi/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la lo zhig gis/ 
347b3('bum): rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdo/ 
347b4('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
347b5('bum): phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas
347b6('bum): pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis
347b7('bum): shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyos shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes
347b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ rang byang chub rnams yod par 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ mo pa brgyas
348a1('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par
348a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel las/ 
348a3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdo// bde bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
348a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan pa ra gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de/ bkrol zhing rnam par bya ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par
348a5('bum): bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin
348a6('bum): du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa
348a7('bum): la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par
348a8('bum): gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i
348b1('bum): me/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa de bas kyang yo
348b2('bum): rdzogs par gyur pa 'i tshe/ khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du pe lo// 
348b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnamaso// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can/ bla na med pa
348b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ba skul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling chen po pa ba zhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
348b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis// bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du
348b6('bum): sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma // bde bar gshegs pa ma // 
348b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan
348b8('bum): bar gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rom
349a1('bum): / tu phyin bzung shig/ kun chub par gyis shog/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan
349a2('bum): du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
349a3('bum): shu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
349a4('bum): kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
349a5('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyu ra ba de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes
349a6('bum): bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phe lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam so// ko shi ka/ 
349a7('bum): gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi
349a8('bum): khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau
349b1('bum): shi kang ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdo// bde bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom
349b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de
349b3('bum): bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
349b4('bum): zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan dan
349b5('bum): du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
349b6('bum): slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur
349b7('bum): ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
349b8('bum): gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yong su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
350a1('bum): / rgyu 'o nas bsgron/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phe'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpal
350a2('bum): po rnam so// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag por bskul ba byis pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka
350a3('bum): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ blad med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
350a4('bum): dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
350a5('bum): 'das mdo// bde bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me gang gis shes ra
350a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas par
350a7('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar
350a8('bum): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi
350b1('bum): bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad
350b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
350b3('bum): pa rabs kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i rgyu/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par
350b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phelo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems
350b5('bum): dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can bla na med pa yang
350b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs
350b7('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ 
350b8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma // bde bar gshegs pa ma // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka
351a1('bum): debs kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / 
351a2('bum): bshang de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan babs pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzung shig/ kun chub par

351a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyuraro// gang gi nga khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
351a6('bum): kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi cha khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
351a7('bum): bsgom pa de bas kyang yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams
351a8('bum): mang du'ang lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi steng
351b1('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing
351b2('bum): gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la lo zhig gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang

351b5('bum): 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjo da de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa
351b6('bum): byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ tshangs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la
351b7('bum): gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed
351b8('bum): bde'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis
352a1('bum): / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes
352a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de bas kyang yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa de'i
352a3('bum): khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
352a4('bum): 'di las byung ba ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam so// kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji
352a5('bum): snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs

352a7('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nga don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad da bkrol zhing
352a8('bum): rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig
352b1('bum): chongs shig/ lhogs shig// tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pa
